title: Finance Executive
description: SAVE JOB Finance Executive  The Finance Executive will manage the restaurant’s financial operations, including budgeting, financial reporting, and cost analysis, to support profitability.  This role requires A Bachelor’s degree in Finance or Accounting, 3-5 years of experience (preferably in restaurants), and proficiency in accounting software.  Key OKRs include achieving a 10% increase in profit margins, reducing accounts receivable by 15%, and ensuring 99% accuracy in financial reporting. In-Depth Description The Finance Executive at Junior Kuppanna Restaurant will be responsible for managing the financial operations, ensuring accuracy, and providing strategic insights to support decision-making and business growth. Given the financial pressures of the restaurant industry, such as managing high-volume transactions and seasonal fluctuations, this role is crucial for maintaining profitability and sustainability. Responsibilities The Finance Executive will undertake the following duties: Prepare and manage the restaurant’s annual budget and financial forecasts, ensuring alignment with business goals and market conditions. Oversee daily financial operations, including accounts payable, accounts receivable, and cash flow management, to ensure smooth financial processes. Prepare monthly, quarterly, and annual financial reports for management and stakeholders, providing clear insights into financial performance. Analyze financial data to identify trends, opportunities for cost reduction, and areas for improvement, such as optimizing supplier contracts or reducing waste. Assist in developing financial strategies to support the restaurant’s growth and profitability, such as expanding menu offerings or opening new locations. Ensure compliance with financial regulations and accounting standards in Sri Lanka, including tax laws and reporting requirements. Manage relationships with banks, auditors, and other financial institutions, ensuring smooth financial operations and access to capital. Implement and maintain financial systems and controls to enhance efficiency and accuracy, such as adopting accounting software for real-time reporting. Ideal Qualifications and Experience To succeed in this role, candidates should meet the following criteria: Education: A Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, or a related field, providing a strong foundation in financial principles and practices. Experience: At least 3-5 years of experience in finance, with a preference for roles in the hospitality or restaurant industry, where understanding financial challenges like high-volume transactions is essential. Skills: Strong understanding of financial principles, accounting practices, and budgeting, ensuring accurate financial management. Experience with financial planning, forecasting, and analysis, critical for strategic decision-making. Proficiency in accounting software (e.g., QuickBooks, SAP) and financial analysis tools, enabling efficient reporting and analysis. Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills, necessary for interpreting financial data and advising management. Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines, given the fast-paced nature of restaurant operations. Additional Requirements: Familiarity with the financial challenges of the restaurant industry, such as managing seasonal fluctuations and high operational costs, is highly beneficial.  Knowledge of Sri Lankan tax laws and financial regulations is also essential. Key OKRs (Objectives and Key Results) To measure performance and align with business goals, the following OKRs are proposed Objective: Achieve a 10% increase in profit margins. Key Results: Identify and implement cost-saving measures, such as negotiating better supplier contracts, to reduce expenses. Optimize pricing strategies based on market analysis, ensuring competitiveness and profitability. Reduce operational costs by 5% within the first year, targeting areas like food waste and utility usage. Objective: Improve cash flow management by reducing accounts receivable by 15%. Key Results: Implement stricter credit control policies for customers, ensuring timely payments. Streamline invoicing and payment processes to reduce delays, such as automating reminders. Monitor and follow up on overdue accounts weekly, ensuring collections are prioritized. Objective: Enhance financial reporting accuracy to 99%. Key Results: Conduct monthly reconciliations of all financial records to ensure accuracy and identify discrepancies. Implement robust internal controls to prevent errors, such as dual approvals for expenditures. Provide training to staff on financial procedures and compliance, ensuring understanding and adherence. PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS

title: යන්ත්‍ර ක්‍රියාකරු / Machine Operator
description: SAVE JOB රැකියා ඇබෑර්තු යන්ත්‍ර ක්‍රියාකරු (Machine Operator) ෆෝබ්ස් ඇන්ඩ් වෝකර් (පුද්ගලික) සමාගම යනු තේ තැරැව්කාර කර්මාන්තයේ ප්‍රමුඛ නාමයක් වන අතර, එහි අනුබද්ධ සමාගමක් වන මුතුරාජවෙල පිහිටි ෆෝබ්ස් ඇන්ඩ් වෝකර් වෙයාහවුසින් පුද්ගලික සමාගමේ ක්‍රියාකාරී කණ්ඩායමට සම්බන්ධ වීමට දක්ෂ යන්ත්‍ර ක්‍රියාකරුවෙකු අවශ්‍ය වී ඇත. රැකියා පැතිකඩ : ගබඩාවේ භාවිතා කරන රීච් ට්‍රක් රථ නඩත්තු කිරීම, අලුත්වැඩියා කිරීම සහ කාර්යක්ෂමව ක්‍රියාත්මක කිරීම සදහා යන්ත්‍ර ක්‍රියාකරු වගකිව යුතුය. මෙම තනතුරට තාක්ෂණික ගැටළු හදුනා ගැනීම, අමතර නිර්දේශ කිරීම සහ බාධාවකින් තොරව මෙහෙයුම් සදහා සහය වීම මෙන්ම සියලුම උපකරණ ප්‍රශස්ත ක්‍රියාකාරී තත්වයේ පවතින බව සහතික කිරීම ඇතුලත් වේ. වගකීම් : රීච් ට්‍රක් රථ සහ අනෙකුත් ගබඩා උපකරණ ක්‍රියාත්මක කිරීම, නඩත්තු කිරීම සහ අලුත්වැඩියා කිරීම.  යන්ත්‍රවල යාන්ත්‍රික හා තාක්ෂණික ගැටළු හදුනා ගෙන විසදුම් සෙවීම. ආරක්ෂාව හා කාර්යක්ෂමතාව සහතික කරමින් සාමාන්‍ය නඩත්තු කටයුතු සිදු කිරීම. උපකරණ කාර්ය සාධනය නිරීක්ෂණය කිරීම සහ වැඩිදියුණු කිරීම්, නිර්දේශ කිරීම. ගබඩා කාර්ය මණ්ඩලය සමග සහයෝගයෙන් කටයුතු කිරීම. අලුත්වැඩියා කිරීම, නඩත්තු කිරීම සහ අමතර කොටස් තොග පිළිබද සවිස්තර වාර්තා තබා ගැනීම.  යන්ත්‍රෝපකරණ ක්‍රියාත්මක කිරීමේදී ආරක්ෂක ප්‍රමිතීන් සහ රෙගුලාසි වලට අනුකූල වීම සහතික කිරීම.  අලුත්වැඩියා කිරීම් සහ වැඩිදියුණු කිරීම් සදහා අවශ්‍ය අමතර කොටස් හදුනා ගැනීමට සහ ඇණවුම් කිරීමට සහය වීම. සුදුසුකම් : පිළිගත් ආයතනයකින් (NAITA , German Tech, AETI, හෝ VTA) තාක්ෂණික සුදුසුකම් තිබිය යුතුය. යන්ත්‍ර ක්‍රියාකරුවෙකු හෝ කාර්මිකයෙකු ලෙස ගබඩා පරිසරයක, රීච් ට්‍රක් (Reach Trucks) හෝ ඒ හා සමාන උපකරණ සමග ඔප්පු කල හැකි පළපුරුද්ද යන්ත්‍ර ගැටළු හදුනා ගැනීමේ හැකියාව, නඩත්තු කිරීම සහ අලුත්වැඩියා කිරීමේ ක්‍රම පිළිබද දැනුම අමතර කොටස් කළමනාකරණය හා ප්‍රසම්පාදන ක්‍රියාවලීන් පිළිබද පලපුද්ද අමතර සුදුසුකමකි ස්වාධීනව වැඩ කිරීමේ හැකියාව සහ කණ්ඩායම් සමග සහයෝගයෙන් කටයුතු කිරිම. ආරක්ෂක විධිවිධාන සහ රෙගුලාසි පිළිබද දැනුම යන්ත්‍ර ක්‍රියාකාරිත්වය හෝ ඒ ආශ්‍රිත ක්ෂේත්‍රය තුල සහතික තිබීම අමතර සුදුසුකමකි. වැටුප - පළපුරුද්ද සහ සුදුසුකම් මත පදනම වේ. (වයස - 35 ට අඩු) XpressJobs හරහා ඔබගේ විස්තර යැවීමට කරුණාකර අයදුම් කිරීමේ බොත්තම ක්ලික් කරන්න මානව සම්පත් කළමනාකරු Forbes & Walker (Pvt) Ltd 46/38, නවම් මාවත කොළඹ 2 Machine Operator Forbes & Walker (Private) is a leading company in the tea brokerage industry and its subsidiary company Forbes & Walker Warehousing Pvt ltd, located in Muthurajawela. We are looking for a skilled machine operator to join our operational team. Job Profile: The Machine Operator is responsible for the maintenance, repair and efficient operation of the reach trucks used in the warehouse. This position includes identifying technical issues, recommending spares and assisting with uninterrupted operations as well as ensuring all equipment is in optimal working condition. Responsibilities: Operation, maintenance and repair of reach trucks and other warehouse equipment. Identifying mechanical and technical problems of machines and finding solutions. Perform routine maintenance ensuring safety and efficiency. Monitor equipment performance and recommend improvements. Collaborate with warehouse staff. Keeping detailed records of repairs, maintenance and spare parts stock. Ensuring compliance with safety standards and regulations while operating machinery. Assist in identifying and ordering spare parts for repairs and upgrades. Requirements: Must have a technical qualification from a recognized institution (NAITA, German Tech, AETI, or VTA). Proven experience as a machine operator or technician in a warehouse environment, with Reach Trucks or similar equipment Ability to diagnose machine problems, knowledge of maintenance and repair procedures Experience in spare parts management and procurement processes is an added advantage Ability to work independently and collaborate with teams. Knowledge of safety standards and regulations Certificates in machine operation or related field is an added qualification. Salary – Based on experience and qualifications. title: Human Resources Generalist - Female
description: SAVE JOB AmSafe designs and manufactures engineered textile solutions for the safety and securement needs of the global aerospace and defense markets. AmSafe has been present in Sri Lanka for over 24 years and has manufacturing operations and service facilities around the globe. We are based in the Wathupitiwala Export Processing Zone, and we produce a significant amount of products, which go into the global aviation market. We also provide support services for the Sales, Finance, Engineering, Procurement, and IT sectors within the group. Human Resources Generalist - Female  Job Profile: We are seeking a proactive and people-focused Human Resources Generalist to play a pivotal role in shaping employee experiences and strengthening organizational culture. This individual will be responsible for driving HR initiatives that support talent growth, foster engagement, and ensure smooth HR operations across the company. Key Responsibilities: Onboarding and orientation: Deliver engaging onboarding experiences that integrate new hires into the company culture and set them up for success. Employee relations: Provide guidance and support to employees and managers, ensuring workplace issues are addressed constructively. Compensation & Rewards Management: Administer monthly payroll processes for operators to supervisory staff, ensuring accuracy, timeliness, and compliance; address and resolve payroll-related inquiries. Support career pathing and succession planning: Work with managers to create clear growth opportunities and prepare employees for future leadership roles. Design and implement engagement initiatives: Develop programs, events, and activities that foster a positive workplace culture and strengthen employee connection to the organization. Facilitate communication channels: Ensure transparent and consistent communication between employees and leadership, encouraging open dialogue and trust. Champion diversity and inclusion: Support initiatives that create an inclusive environment where all employees feel valued and respected. Key Requirements: A degree in Human Resource Management from a reputed university or CQHRM/PQHRM from the Chartered Institute of Personnel Management 5-7 years of proven experience as an HR Executive in a manufacturing environment. Hands on experience in payroll systems, time & attendance, leave management and reporting.  Excellent interpersonal skills with strong written and verbal communication in English Prior experience or exposure to strategic HR functions will be a definite advantage  Female candidates are encouraged to apply. Above position will suit for any ambitious individual, looking for a career with a truly international organization. The remuneration package will commensurate with qualification and experience. PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS Chief Human Resources Officer, AmSafe Bridport (Pvt) Ltd. Export Processing Zone, Wathupitiwala - Nittambuwa. View Job Ad

title: Recruitment Assistant
company: Pita Chris Barnard Health Sri Lanka
description: SAVE JOB Recruitment Assistant | Pita Kotte  Australian Based Company Full Time | On Site Mon - Fri | 06.30 AM to 02.30 PM About Us We are a 100% Australian-based Health Care company looking for a suitable candidate for the job role of Recruitment Assistant for our Sri Lankan office. We work exclusively with aged care facilities in Australia to support their staffing needs of health care workers. Role Overview As a Recruitment Assistant, you will play a key role in supporting the recruitment operations of Chris Barnard Health by sourcing, screening, and engaging Registered Nurses and Caregivers across Australia. Reporting to the Recruitment Manager / Business Manager, this role is responsible for conducting initial candidate outreach, assessing suitability for contract placements, and maintaining accurate recruitment records. The role involves frequent direct communication with healthcare professionals to understand their availability, experience, and compliance readiness, while clearly explaining contract terms and company expectations. The Recruitment Assistant supports the end-to-end recruitment process by coordinating candidate documentation, updating recruitment systems, and ensuring a smooth progression from initial contact to onboarding. This position requires strong communication skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work collaboratively with internal stakeholders including Compliance Officers, Operations Staff, and Recruiters to ensure workforce demand is met in a timely and compliant manner. Key Responsibilities Conduct outbound and inbound calls to Registered Nurses and Caregivers in Australia to assess interest and suitability for contract engagement. Perform initial screening to evaluate qualifications, experience, availability, work rights, and compliance readiness. Clearly explain contract terms, role expectations, pay structures, and company processes to candidates. Maintain accurate, complete, and up-to-date candidate records in the recruitment database or CRM. Coordinate with Compliance and Operations teams to collect, verify, and track required documentation. Support the onboarding process by ensuring candidates meet all pre- engagement requirements. Follow up with candidates to progress applications in a timely manner and reduce drop-offs. Meet daily and weekly recruitment activity targets, including calls, screenings, and candidate conversions. Ensure all recruitment activities comply with internal policies and Australian healthcare staffing standards. Communicate effectively with internal stakeholders to support workforce planning and placement needs. Qualifications Diploma or Bachelor's qualification in Human Resources, Business Administration, Management, or a related field (preferred). Previous experience in recruitment, resourcing, call handling, customer service, or healthcare staffing will be an advantage. Familiarity with healthcare roles such as Registered Nurses, Enrolled Nurses, or Caregivers is desirable. Understanding of basic recruitment processes and candidate screening methods. Exposure to the Australian healthcare or aged care sector is an added advantage. Proficiency in using computers, recruitment systems/CRMs, and standard office applications (email, spreadsheets, documents). Strong verbal and written communication skills in English. Why Join Us? Attractive Package: Enjoy a competitive salary to recognize your hard work Vibrant Culture: Thrive in a progressive and creative team environment where your ideas are valued and encouraged. Future Opportunities: Join a growing team and play a vital role in shaping the future of our business Professional Development: Benefit from targeted mentoring and coaching to enhance your professional growth Make a Difference: Contribute significantly to helping our home care clients live at home longer with a coordinated support structure PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS

description: SAVE JOB කාඩ් මුද්‍රණ යන්ත්‍ර කාර්මික රැකියා පැතිකඩ: කාර්ඩ් මුද්‍රණ යන්ත්‍ර සහ ලේසර් මුද්‍රණ යන්ත්‍ර ස්ථාපනය කිරීම, නඩත්තු කිරීම සහ අලුත්වැඩියා කිරීම කාර්මිකයා විසින් සිදු කරනු ලැබේ වගකීම් අතර තාක්ෂණික ගැටළු නිරාකරණය කිරීම සහ නිවැරදි කිරීම, සාමාන්‍ය නඩත්තු කටයුතු සිදු කිරීම. කොටස් ප්‍රතිස්ථාපනය කිරීම සහ උපකරණ භාවිතය පිළිබඳව ගනුදෙනුකරුවන් පුහුණු කිරීම ඇතුළත් වේ. මෙම භූමිකාවට යාන්ත්‍රික සහ විදුලි දැනුම ඇතුළුව ශක්තිමත් ගැටළු විසඳීමේ කුසලතා අවශ්‍ය වේ, පාරිභෝගික සේවා සහ ලියකියවිලි කුසලතා. කණ්ඩායම් වැඩ කිරීමේ කුසලතා සහ හිමිකාරිත්වය සමඟ කාර්යයන් සම්පූර්ණ කිරීමේ හැකියාව තිබිය යුතුය. සුදුසුකම් සහ කුසලතා: පිළිගත් ආයතනයකින් NVQ මට්ටම 04 සහ ඊට වැඩි හෝ ඊට සමාන සුදුසුකම්. දෘඩාංග තාක්ෂණික සහ IT අලුත්වැඩියා අංශයේ අවම වශයෙන් අවුරුදු 02 ක සේවා පළපුරුද්ද. ඉංග්‍රීසි සහ සිංහල භාෂාවලින් වාචිකව සහ ලිඛිතව හොඳ සන්නිවේදනයක්. MS-Windows සහ Intel පාදක පරිගණක දෘඩාංග පිළිබඳ හොඳ දෝශ නිරාකරණ කුසලතා. වයස අවුරුදු 40 ට අඩු විය යුතුය. පාරිභෝගික ස්ථාන වෙත ගොස් මුද්‍රණ යන්ත්‍ර අලුත්වැඩියා කිරීමට හැකි විය යුතුය XpressJobs හරහා ඔබේ විස්තර යැවීමට කරුණාකර අයදුම් කරන්න බොත්තම ක්ලික් කරන්න. Card Printer Technician Softlogic is a highly diversified Group of Companies with over 11,000 employees in Sri Lanka and Australia and the annual turnover is approximately LKR 76 Billion. Softlogic Group is one of the most diversified blue-chip conglomerates in the country and we have built strong, sustainable market leading positions in a range of high growth sectors including ICT, Telecommunications, Health Care, Retail, Financial Services, Automobiles and Leisure. Job Profile: Technician installs, maintains, and repairs card printers and laser printers responsibilities include troubleshooting and fixing technical issues, performing routine maintenance. replacing parts, and training customers on equipment use. This role requires strong problem-solving skills, including mechanical and electrical knowledge, Customer service and documentation skills. Must be a team player, and complete task with ownership. Qualifications and Skills expected: NVQ Level 04 and above or equivalent qualifications from a recognized Institute. Minimum 02 years’ working experience in Hardware Technical and IT Repair sector. Good communication in English and Sinhala languages, both verbal and written. Good troubleshooting skills on MS-Windows and Intel based computer hardware. Age should below 40 years. Customer Site visit and repair printers  PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR DETAILS VIA XPRESSJOBS

title: Customer Success Executive
description: SAVE JOB Customer Success Executive Shopbook is a Sri Lankan fintech company on a mission to help small businesses and shopkeepers get paid on time without chasing. We provide automated financial management solutions that simplify credit management, payment reminders, and cash flow tracking for small enterprises across Sri Lanka. Our platform serves thousands of businesses with features like trilingual SMS reminders, automated reporting, and seamless payment collection. As a Junior Customer Success Executive, you will play a key role in converting free trial users into paid customers, providing them with exceptional support, and acting as a vital link between users, co-founders, and the development team. Requirements to apply: Previous experience in a similar customer engagement, sales, or onboarding role is an advantage.  Fluency in Sinhala is a must; proficiency in Tamil and English is highly advantageous. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills. Basic understanding of digital tools and apps, particularly in the MSME sector, is a plus. If you are selected for the vacancy your job responsibilities would include:  Customer Engagement: Reach out to free trial users via phone to guide them through the benefits of upgrading to paid plans. Build strong relationships with customers, understanding their business challenges and how Shopbook can address them. Feedback Collection: Gather customer feedback during interactions and compile actionable insights for the co- founders and development team. Identify patterns or recurring issues and suggest product or process improvements.  Product Demonstrations & Onboarding: Conduct demos and walkthroughs of Shopbook to help customers get the most out of the platform. Ensure smooth onboarding by answering queries and assisting customers in setting up their accounts effectively. Customer Support: Address customer concerns promptly and escalate any technical issues to the appropriate team. Act as a go-to point for free trial users transitioning to paid customers. This is a full time role from Monday to Friday, 8.30 am to 5.30 pm Shopbook Technologies (Private) Limited,  2nd Floor, No. 345, Galle Road,  Colombo 03 PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS View Job Ad

description: SAVE JOB අලෙවි නිලධාරි | කොළඹ සහ කුරුණෑගල ඇමතුම් මධ්‍යස්ථානය සඳහා අලෙවි නිලධාරීවරුන් බඳවා ගැනීම ඇමතුම් මධ්‍යස්ථානය සඳහා අලෙවි නිලධාරි තනතුර  ස්ථානය: කොළඹ සහ කුරුණෑගල අංශය: අලෙවිකරණ අංශය - (ග්ලෝබල් ස්කිල්ස් ඩිවලොප්මන්ට් කැම්පස්) ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ තරුණයින්ගේ භාෂා දැනුම, තාක්ෂණික හැකියාවන් සහ සංස්කෘතික හා සමාජමය අවබෝධය වර්ධනය කිරීම සඳහා කැපවූ ප්‍රමුඛ ආයතනයකි. අපගේ මෙහෙවර වන්නේ ගෝලීය කාර්ය බලකායට සුදානම් වූ සිසුන් ගොඩනැඟීම සහ උසස් සංවර්ධිත රටවල රැකියා අවස්ථාවන් ඔවුන්ට ලබාදීමයි. අපගේ කොළඹ හා කුරුණෑගල ශාඛාවල ඇමතුම් මධ්‍යස්ථාන සඳහා අලෙවි නිලධාරීන් ලෙස එක්වීමට සුදුසුකම් සහ අත්දැකීම් ඇති පුද්ගලයින් බඳවා ගැනීමට අප සොයමු. මෙම තනතුර සඳහා සිංහල භාෂාවෙන් නි- වැරදිව සන්නිවේදනය කිරීමේ හැකියාව, විශිෂ්ට අලෙවි කරන ඥානයක් සහ විකුණුම් ක්‍රියාවලියේ සියලුම අංග ඵලදායී ලෙස කළමනාකරණය කිරීමේ හැකියාව අවශ්‍ය වේ. රැකියා සුදුසුකම්: පළපුරුද්ද: අලෙවි කරන අංශයක හෝ ඊට අදාළ ක්ෂේත්‍රයක අවම වශයෙන් වසර 2ක පළපුරුද්ද. සන්නිවේදන කුසලතා: විශිෂ්ට දුරකථන ආචාර විධි භාවිතය සහ සිංහල භාෂා සන්නිවේදන කුසලතා. දෙමළ හෝ ඉංග්‍රීසි භාෂාවෙන් සන්නිවේදනය කිරීමේ හැකියාව අමතර වාසියකි. විකුණුම් කුසලතා නිර්මාණාත්මක චින්තන කුසලතා සමඟ හොඳ අලෙවි කරන හැකියාවක් සතුවීම. පාරිභෝගික කටයුතු ඉවසීම සහ ගනුදෙනුකරුවන් සංවාදයට සම්බන්ධ කර ගැනීමේ හැකියාවක් සතුවීම. ගැටළු විසඳීම: ගැටළු විසඳීමේ කුසලතා සහ පීඩනය යටතේ වැඩ කිරීමේ හැකියාවක් සතුවීම. තාක්ෂණික ප්‍රවීණතාවය: Excel / Word පරිගණක මෘදුකාංග හසුරුවමින් වැඩ කිරීමේ දැනුම හා හැකියාව. රැකියා වගකීම්: පාරිභෝගිකයින් දැනුවත් කිරීම සඳහා ආයතනයේ සියලුම සේවාවන් පිළිබඳව යාවත්කාලීනව සිටීම. පාරිභෝගිකයින් සමඟ ශක්තිමත් සබඳතාවක් වර්ධනය කර පවත්වාගෙන යාම.  පාරිභෝගික අවශ්‍යතාවලට සවන්දීම, අපේක්ෂාවන් හදුනා ගැනීම සහ එය සපුරලීම.  පාරිභෝගික පැමිණිලි සඳහා කාලෝචිත හා නිවැරුදි පිළිතුරු ලබා දී ප්‍රශ්න විසඳීම.  පාරිභෝගික තොරතුරු සහ ගෙවීම් විස්තර එකතු කර ලේඛනගත කිරීම.  කණ්ඩායමට සහ ඔබට ලබා දී ඇති සහ විකුණුම් ඉලක්ක (KPls) සපුරාලීම.  කණ්ඩායම් සාමජයෙකු ලෙස ක්‍රියාකාරීව කටයුතු කරගෙන යෑමේ හැකියාව. අපි පිරිනමන දේ: ආකර්ශනීය වැටුප් පැකේජයක්. විශිෂ්ට වෘත්තීය සංවර්ධන අවස්ථා. XPRESSJOBS හරහා ඔබගේ CV එක යැවීමට කරුණාකර අයදුම් කරන්න බොත්තම ක්ලික් කරන්න. Sales Officer | Colombo & Kurunegala Recruitment of Sales Officers for Call Center Sales Officer Position for Call Center Location: Colombo & Kurunegala Department: Marketing Division - (Global Skills Development Campus) A leading institution dedicated to developing the language skills, technical skills and cultural and social awareness of the youth of Sri Lanka. Our mission is to build students who are ready for the global workforce and provide them with employment opportunities in highly developed countries. We are looking to recruit qualified and experienced individuals to join our call centers in Colombo and Kurunegala branches as Sales Officers. The position requires excellent communication skills in Sinhala, excellent sales acumen and the ability to effectively manage all aspects of the sales process. Job Qualifications: Experience: Minimum 2 years of experience in a sales role or related field. Communication Skills: Excellent telephone etiquette and Sinhala language communication skills. Ability to communicate in Tamil or English is an added advantage. Sales Skills: Good sales skills with creative thinking skills. Customer service patience and ability to engage customers in conversation. Problem Solving: Problem solving skills and ability to work under pressure. Technical Proficiency: Knowledge and ability to work with Excel / Word computer software. Job Responsibilities: Keeping up to date with all the services of the organization to educate customers. Develop and maintain strong relationships with customers. Listen to customer needs, identify expectations and meet them. Resolve issues by providing timely and accurate responses to customer complaints. Collect and document customer information and payment details. Meet sales targets (KPls) assigned to the team and yourself. Ability to work proactively as a team member. What we offer: Attractive salary package. Excellent career development opportunities. PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS View Job Ad

title: Collection & Recovery Officer
company: Work From Home Payzy Payments Pvt Ltd , Work From Home
description: SAVE JOB Collection & Recovery Officer | Work From Home Salary: LKR 30,000 per month Employment Type: Full-time Work Mode: Hybrid (Work From Home + office when required) Availability: Immediate Joining Key Responsibilities: Contact customers regarding overdue Payzy installments via calls, WhatsApp, and email Handle customer conversations in a professional, calm, and respectful manner, even under pressure Follow up consistently to ensure timely recovery of outstanding amounts Negotiate repayment timelines while maintaining Payzy’s brand standards Maintain accurate daily recovery records and updates Escalate high-risk or long-overdue accounts when required Achieve recovery targets as assigned Requirements: Ability to manage difficult conversations calmly and professionally Prior experience in collections, recovery, call center, or finance is an advantage Strong communication skills in Sinhala and English (Tamil is an added advantage) Basic knowledge of Excel / Google Sheets Self-motivated and disciplined in a hybrid work environment Must be available for immediate joining KPIs & Incentives: KPIs will be assigned by the Team Leader Incentives will be paid based on individual performance What Payzy Offers: Fixed salary of LKR 30,000 Hybrid work flexibility Performance-based incentives Career growth in a fast-growing fintech / BNPL company PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS

title: Customer Service cum Sales Marketing Support Coordinator
description: SAVE JOB Customer Service cum Sales Marketing Support Coordinator Our client is an Australian based Water filtration company operating in Australia, New Zealand and Indonesia. Based in Melbourne Australia, covering east coast of Australia with an experienced team of water experts and Trades Teams, we’ve built a reputation for delivering premium water purification systems with a personal touch. Whether it’s a family seeking safer drinking water or a business upgrading its filtration infrastructure, we pride ourselves on making every interaction clear, caring, and solution-focused. Our team combines technical excellence with genuine service. We design and install high-performance filtration systems tailored to Australian conditions, and we back them with responsive support, streamlined order management, and marketing that educates and inspires. From CRM coordination to promotional campaigns, every role here contributes to a healthier, more hydrated community. If you’re passionate about helping people, thrive in fast-paced environments, and enjoy turning technical products into meaningful customer experiences,  this highly rewarding role is for you. Key Responsibilities Provide excellent customer service via phone and email, assisting clients and candidates with inquiries. Manage high-volume calls and emails professionally and efficiently. Perform data entry and maintain records to ensure accurate and up-to-date information. Assist with reporting, generating daily and weekly reports as needed. Support onboarding and inductions, coordinating schedules and documentation. Liaise with internal teams to ensure seamless communication and workflow. Minimum Requirements, A/L completed in the Science stream  Positive attitude/ hunter mindset Minimum 1 year of experience in overseas operations in a Call Center, Sales & Marketing, or Business Administration Fluent in English - clear accent is important Science / Chemistry professional qualification or any skills in water will be advantageous  Female preferred / but a well-disciplined male can be considered If required, professional training (further study opportunity can be considered) Requirements Immediate availability preferred to start by November  Benefits Six-figure starting salary  Attractive bonus scheme with unlimited rewards for achieving collective sales targets  Extensive training  All the high-end software tools to be used  PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS

title: Outbound Sales Executive UK Market
description: SAVE JOB Outbound Sales Executive UK Market | Colombo Job Type: Full-Time (4 days a week, Wednesdays off) Salary: Competitive (UK-based company with attractive commission) Working Hours: 1-8PM About the Role A dynamic UK-based finance company is setting up its new outbound sales call center in Sri Lanka. We’re looking for confident, results-driven sales professionals to join our Colombo team. You'll be directly engaging with UK business owners, introducing them to business funding solutions and generating high-quality leads. This is a high-performance, high-reward role — perfect for individuals with strong cold-calling skills, international exposure, and a passion for sales. Key Responsibilities Make 75–100 outbound calls daily to UK-based small and medium-sized business owners. Engage prospects in professional, value-driven conversations to introduce funding options. Identify and qualify leads based on interest and eligibility Send follow-up emails to interested leads, requesting necessary documentation. Accurately update call outcomes and lead statuses in the CRM. What We’re Looking For Experience: Minimum 3–5 years in outbound B2B/B2C cold calling. Industry Knowledge: Experience in UK/US/Western markets is a bonus. Communication: Excellent English (spoken and written) with a neutral or clear accent. Tech Savvy: Familiarity with CRMs (e.g., HubSpot), VoIP systems, dialers, and spreadsheets. Resilience, persistence, and a positive attitude toward achieving daily targets. Ability to follow structured scripts while also thinking on your feet during live calls. What We Offer Competitive salary and performance-based incentives Full training and sales scripts tailored to the UK market. Exposure to UK finance industry practices and career development opportunities. Supportive work environment with clear processes and realistic expectations. PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS

title: Culinary Creator & Cooking Operations Manager
description: SAVE JOB Culinary Creator & Cooking Operations Manager We are seeking an experienced and multi-talented professional to lead our culinary initiatives. This highly visible and hands-on role combines content creation, culinary instruction, hospitality management, and production oversight. Key Responsibilities This role encompasses four primary areas of focus: Culinary Content Creation Develop & Film: Conceptualize, script, and film compelling, high-quality recipe videos and tutorials that showcase COOKWARE (PVT) LTD products. Digital Engagement: Create inspiring visual content (e.g., Tiktok, Instagram and Youtube) to engage and educate our audience. Recipe Development: Design and test recipes for print, online publication, and workshop use. Cooking Workshops & Instruction Curriculum & Teaching: Design, market, and lead engaging, hands-on cooking and baking workshops for various skill levels. Learning Environment: Ensure a fun, informative, and professional educational experience, focusing on proper technique and product usage. Supper Club Hosting & Management Plan & Execute: Oversee the successful planning, seasonal menu development, and execution of our exclusive Supper Club dining events. Guest Experience: Serve as the host, chef, and ambassador, delivering an intimate, high-end hospitality experience. Bakery Production Operations Production Oversight: Establish and manage daily or weekly small-scale bakery operations, focusing on high-quality production of baked goods and pastries. Quality Control: Maintain stringent standards for recipe consistency, ingredient sourcing, and overall product quality for all goods produced. Inventory & Ordering: Manage ingredient inventory, ordering, and cost control for the bakery and Supper Club concepts. Qualifications & Skills Minimum 2 years of professional experience in a culinary role. Experience in Pastry Arts and Baking Production. Proven experience in content creation (video production, food styling, or recipe writing). Public speaking, teaching, and presentation skills. Strong organizational, inventory, and cost management abilities. Must be a motivated self-starter capable of managing multiple projects (content, classes, production, events) simultaneously. About Us: COOKWARE (PVT) LTD is a leading distributor of premium cookware in Sri Lanka. Our mission is to bring the finest kitchen tools to homes across the country, enhancing the cooking experience for every culinary enthusiast. We are dedicated to quality and innovation, making us a trusted name in the industry. What We Offer: Competitive salary and benefits package. Opportunity to work with a leading brand in the premium cookware industry. A creative and supportive work environment. Opportunities for professional development and growth within the company. At McLarens, we prioritize growth, continually investing in our people and foster a vibrant culture of innovation and collaboration. ගබඩා සුපරීක්ෂක  | කෙරවලපිටිය මැක්ලරන්ස් සමූහය දැන් එහි අනුබද්ධ සමාගමක් වන ස්පෙක්ට්‍රා ලොජිස්ටික්ස් (පුද්ගලික) සමාගමට සම්බන්ධ වීමට අභිලාෂකාමී, ජවසම්පන්න සහ දක්ෂ පුද්ගලයෙකු සොයමින් සිටී. ස්පෙක්ට්‍රා යනු කොන්ත්‍රාත් සැපයුම්, බහාලුම් ගබඩාව, ඒකාබද්ධ ප්‍රවාහනය සහ රේගු තැරැව්කාර සේවය ඇතුළත් අන්තයේ සිට අවසානය දක්වා සැපයුම් සේවා සපයන ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ ප්‍රමුඛතම සැපයුම්කරුවෙකි. වත්තල ස්පෙක්ට්‍රා ලොජිස්ටික්ස් උද්‍යානයේ ස්පෙක්ට්‍රා බෙදාහැරීමේ මධ්‍යස්ථානය සහ අපගේම වාහන ඇණියක් සහිත හොඳින් සන්නද්ධ බහාලුම් අංගනයක් ඇතුළුව අපගේ මෙහෙයුම් සහ සේවා විශිෂ්ටත්වය සහ අපගේ පුළුල් සම්පත්වල එකතුවක් හරහා අපි අපගේ ගනුදෙනුකරුවන්ගේ සැපයුම් සහ සැපයුම් දාම අවශ්‍යතා සපුරාලන්නෙමු. ප්‍රධාන වගකීම් නිවැරදි තොග වාර්තා පවත්වා ගැනීම සහ මාසික වාර්තා සෑදීම ඉන්වොයිස් සහ මිලදී ගැනීමේ ඇණවුම් සමඟ බෙදාහැරීම් සංසන්දනය කිරීම භාණ්ඩ ඉල්ලීම, ප්‍රතිලාභ සහ තත්ත්ව පරීක්ෂාවන් හැසිරවීම. නැවත ඇණවුම් මට්ටම් නිරීක්ෂණය කර මිලදී ගැනීමේ ලියකියවිලි සඳහා සහාය වීම. ඉන්ධන භාවිතය නිරීක්ෂණය කිරීම සහ දෛනික/මාසික වාර්තා සකස් කිරීම. නිසි ගබඩා කිරීම, පිරිසිදුකම සහ භාණ්ඩ ආරක්ෂිතව හැසිරවීම සහතික කිරීම. නිකුත් කරන ලද/ආපසු ලබා දෙන භාණ්ඩ සඳහා ලේඛන සකස් කර අවශ්‍ය අනුමැතිය ලබා ගැනීම. ගෙවීම් සැකසීම සඳහා මූල්‍ය කණ්ඩායම සමඟ සම්බන්ධීකරණය කිරීම. අවශ්‍ය කුසලතා සහ පළපුරුද්ද අ.පො.ස. උසස් පෙළ (අවම වශයෙන් සාමාර්ථ 3). සමාන ධාරිතාවයකින් අවම වශයෙන් වසර 1 ක පළපුරුද්දක්. ගබඩා කළමනාකරණ පද්ධති සහ MS Office සමඟ වැඩ කිරීමේ දැනුම. සාර්ථක අපේක්ෂකයාට කර්මාන්ත ප්‍රමිතීන්ට සහ අනෙකුත් අමතර ප්‍රතිලාභවලට සමාන තරඟකාරී වැටුප් පැකේජයක් ලබා දෙනු ඇත XpressJobs හරහා ඔබේ CV යැවීමට කරුණාකර අයදුම් කිරීමේ බොත්තම ක්ලික් කරන්න. title: පෑස්සුම්කරු / Welder
description: SAVE JOB අපි ගැන McLarens Group යනු විවිධාංගීකරණය වූ ව්‍යාපාරික ක්‍රියාකාරකම් සහිත ප්‍රමුඛ, හොඳින් ස්ථාපිත ව්‍යාපාරික සමූහ ව්‍යාපාරයකි. මැක්ලරන්ස් ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ ව්‍යාපාර සහ ප්‍රගතියෙහි අඛණ්ඩව වර්ධනය වෙමින් ගුණාත්මක භාවය සඳහා ඇති කැපවීම පවත්වා ගැනීම සඳහා සමුද්‍රීය සහ සැපයුම්, ඛනිජ තෙල් සහ බලශක්ති, නිෂ්පාදන සහ බෙදා හැරීම, දේපල සහ උපාය මාර්ගික ආයෝජන සහ විවේකය යන ක්ෂේත්‍රවල විශිෂ්ටත්වය සඳහා පුළුල් ලෙස පිළිගැනේ. McLarens Group දැන් එහි අනුබද්ධ සමාගමක් වන Spectra Logistics (Pvt) Limited හා සම්බන්ධ වීමට අපේක්ෂා කරන, ජවසම්පන්න සහ දක්ෂ පුද්ගලයෙකු සොයමින් සිටී. ස්පෙක්ට්‍රා යනු කොන්ත්‍රාත් සැපයුම්, බහාලුම් ගබඩාව, ඒකාබද්ධ ප්‍රවාහනය සහ රේගු තැරැව්කාර සේවා ඇතුළත් ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ ප්‍රමුඛතම සැපයුම්කරුවෙකි. වත්තල ස්පෙක්ට්‍රා ලොජිස්ටික් උද්‍යානයේ බෙදාහැරීමේ මධ්‍යස්ථානය සහ අපගේම වාහන ඇණියක් සහිත අංගසම්පූර්ණ බහාලුම් අංගනයක් ඇතුළත් අපගේ මෙහෙයුම් සහ සේවා විශිෂ්ටත්වය සහ අපගේ පුළුල් සම්පත් එකතුවක් හරහා අපි අපගේ ගනුදෙනුකරුවන්ගේ සැපයුම් සහ සැපයුම් දාම අවශ්‍යතා සපුරාලමු. පෑස්සුම්කරු ප්‍ර ධාන වගකීම් භාරකරු විසින් පවරා ඇති පරිදි බහාලුම් අලුත්වැඩියාව සිදු කිරීම. භාරකරු විසින් නියම කරන ලද පරිදි GOH ප්‍රබන්ධ කිරීමේ කාර්යයන් සිදු කිරීම. වෙල්ඩින් මෙවලම් සහ උපකරණ නිසි ලෙස නඩත්තු කිරීම සහතික කිරීම. අවශ්‍ය සුදුසුකම් සහ පළපුරුද්ද වෙල්ඩින් පිළිබඳ අවම වශයෙන් වසර 2 ක පළපුරුද්ද. වෙල්ඩින් සහ කැපීම පිළිබඳ සහතික පාඨමාලාවක් සම්පූර්ණ කිරීම අමතර වාසියක් වනු ඇත MIG සහ ARC ඇතුළු විවිධ වෙල්ඩින් ශිල්පීය ක්‍රම පිළිබඳ දැනුම. අතින් සහ යාන්ත්‍රික වෙල්ඩින් ශිල්පීය ක්‍රම පිළිබඳ ප්‍රවීණතාවය. වෙල්ඩින් මෙවලම් සහ උපකරණ සමඟ වැඩ කිරීමේ දැනුම. ඔක්සි-ඇසිටිලීන් කැපීම පිළිබඳ දැනුම. පැතලි, සිරස් සහ ඉහළ ස්ථානවල සංරචක වෑල්ඩින් කිරීමේ හැකියාව. GOH සැකසීමේ පළපුරුද්ද වාසියකි. නිවැරැදි අපේක්ෂකයා සඳහා ආකර්ශනීය වැටුප් පැකේජයක් සහ කර්මාන්ත ආන්තික ප්‍රතිලාභ සහ විශිෂ්ට වෘත්තීය අවස්ථා ලබා දෙනු ඇත. XpressJobs හරහා ඔබේ CV යැවීමට කරුණාකර අයදුම් කිරීමේ බොත්තම ක්ලික් කරන්න ABOUT US McLarens Group is a leading, well-established business conglomerate with diversified business activities. McLarens is widely recognized for excellence in Maritime & Logistics, Petroleum & Energy, Manufacturing & Distribution, Property & Strategic Investments and Leisure to sustain its commitment to quality while continuing to grow in business and stature in Sri Lanka. McLarens Group is now seeking an aspiring, energetic, and competent individual to join its subsidiary company, Spectra Logistics (Pvt) Limited. Spectra is one of Sri Lanka's leading providers of end-to-end logistics services encompassing contract logistics, container depot, integrated transportation, and customs brokerage. We meet our customers' logistics and supply chain needs through a combination of our operational and service excellence and our extensive resources, which include the Spectra Distribution Center at the Spectra Logistics Park in Wattala and a well-equipped container yard with our own vehicle fleet. Welder Key Responsibilities Perform container repairs as assigned by the in-charge. Carry out GOH fabrication tasks as directed by the in-charge.  Ensure welding tools and equipment are maintained properly. Qualifications and Experience Required Minimum 2 years of experience in welding. Certificate course in welding & cutting preferred. Knowledge of various welding techniques, including MIG and ARC.  Proficiency in manual and mechanical welding techniques. Ability to properly use welding tools and equipment. Knowledge of oxy-acetylene cutting. Ability to weld components in flat, vertical, and overhead positions. Experience in GOH fabricating is an advantage. An attractive remuneration package along with industry fringe benefits and excellent career opportunities await the right candidate. title: Inventory Control - Senior Executive
description:
Job Role  We are seeking a highly organized and experienced Inventory Control Senior Executive to manage and oversee inventory operations at Euro Motors. The ideal candidate will be responsible for maintaining accurate stock records, ensuring optimal inventory levels, and supporting smooth warehouse and sales operations. Requirements Degree or Diploma in Supply Chain Management or a related field. Minimum 5 years' experience in inventory management or handling a large store. Experience in spare parts inventory will be a strong advantage. Sound practical knowledge of inventory control, stock management, and store operations. Ability to monitor stock levels, control variances, and minimize stock losses. Experience in handling ERP / inventory management systems. Good computer literacy (MS Excel is essential). Strong analytical, organizational, and problem-solving skills. Ability to work independently and lead store-related activities. Good communication and coordination skills. title: බෙදාහැරීමේ සහකාර - Delivery Assistant
description: SAVE JOB බෙදාහැරීමේ සහකාර රැකියා පැතිකඩ නිවැරදි හැසිරවීම, නිසි ලියකියවිලි සහ ඵලදායී සම්බන්ධීකරණය සහතික කිරීම මගින් අපගේ නිෂ්පාදන කාර්යක්ෂමව සහ කාලෝචිත ලෙස බෙදා හැරීමට සහාය වීම සඳහා අපි බෙදාහැරීමේ සහකාරවරයෙකු සොයමින් සිටිමු. අපගේ සැපයුම් සහ සැපයුම් දාම ක්‍රියාකාරකම්වල සුමට ක්‍රියාකාරිත්වය පවත්වා ගැනීම සඳහා මෙම භූමිකාව අත්‍යවශ්‍ය වේ. අපේක්ෂක පැතිකඩ සාර්ථක වීමට පරමාදර්ශී අපේක්ෂකයා පහත නිර්ණායක සපුරාලිය යුතුය. සමාන ධාරිතාවයකින් අවම වශයෙන් වසර 1 ක සේවා පළපුරුද්ද. අ.පො.ස. සාමාන්‍ය පෙළ සමත්. වලංගු රියදුරු බලපත්‍රය. පිට පළාත්වලට ගමන් කිරීමට සහ දිගු වේලාවක් වැඩ කිරීමට හැකියාව. XPRESS රැකියා හරහා ඔබේ CV යැවීමට කරුණාකර අයදුම් කිරීමේ බොත්තම ක්ලික් කරන්න. Delivery Assistant Job Profile We are seeking a Delivery Assistant to support the efficient and timely delivery of our products by ensuring accurate handling, proper documentation, and effective coordination. This role is essential to maintaining the smooth operation of our logistics and supply chain functions.  Candidate Profile The ideal candidate should fulfil the criteria below to succeed. Minimum 1 year’s work experience in similar capacity. Passed GCE Ordinary Level. Valid Driving License. Ability to travel outstation and work extended hours. description: SAVE JOB Purchasing Executive KEY RESPONSIBILITIES Source & evaluate suppliers; negotiate suppliers, terms & delivery schedules.  Issue purchase orders & ensure timely delivery of materials. title: Senior Executive Retail and Operations
description: SAVE JOB Senior Executive Retail and Operations   Key Responsibilities: Retail Product Pricing & Profitability Management:  Develop and execute pricing strategies to optimize profitability across the retail portfolio. Continuously monitor market trends, competitor pricing, and cost structures to ensure pricing aligns with business objectives while maintaining competitiveness and profitability. Inventory Management & Accountability:  Oversee day-to-day inventory management for the retail portfolio, ensuring accurate stock levels across all locations. Take responsibility for minimizing Out-of-Stock (OOS) situations, ensuring inventory is replenished in a timely manner to avoid lost sales and maintain optimal product availability. Out-of-Stock (OOS) & Availability to Purchase (ATP) Governance:  Monitor OOS metrics, work closely with suppliers and internal teams to improve stock availability, and implement inventory allocation strategies that ensure products are available when customers Inventory Liquidation Strategy:  Develop and implement strategies for liquidating slow moving inventory, including targeted promotions, discounting, and markdowns. Work to optimize inventory turnover, reduce aging stock, and minimize write-offs. Retail Campaign Planning:  Lead retail campaign planning efforts by working with cross functional teams to drive sales, brand visibility, and customer engagement. Ensure that campaigns align with inventory availability and pricing strategies. Performance Monitoring & Reporting:  Track and analyze retail performance metrics, including sales, stock levels, profitability, and inventory turnover. Provide actionable insights and recommendations to improve operational efficiency and maximize financial outcomes. Support for Fulfilled by Daraz (FBD):  Collaborate with the Marketplace Operations teams to ensure smooth execution of orders fulfilled through Daraz. Approve inventory intake orders (IO) and assist with logistics to maintain seamless operations. Ad-Hoc Responsibilities:  Undertake any other ad-hoc tasks as assigned by superiors to support retail operations and business objectives.   Qualifications: Education: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Retail Management, Supply Chain, Marketing, or a related field.  A Master’s degree or relevant certifications (such as in Retail Management, Inventory Management, or Business Analytics) is a plus. Experience: At least 3-5 years of experience in retail operations, inventory management, or product pricing, preferably within the FMCG or retail sector.  Strong understanding of retail pricing strategies, inventory control, and supply chain management. Skills: Strong analytical skills, with the ability to analyze sales data, inventory trends, and profitability metrics. Excellent communication and negotiation skills to collaborate with suppliers, internal teams, and senior management. Proficient in retail management software and inventory management systems is a plus. Ability to work under pressure, manage multiple tasks, and meet deadlines in a fast-paced retail environment. Experience in developing and executing retail campaigns and liquidation strategies. Proficiency in Microsoft Excel and other office productivity tools for reporting and analysis. PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS

title: Estimation Engineer
description: SAVE JOB Hayleys Group is amongst Sri Lanka's largest, and most respected diversified conglomerates with a turnover in excess of USD 1 Billion. FENTONS LIMITED Founded in 1919, Hayleys Fentons Limited is one of Sri Lanka's first engineering companies. As the No.1 Solar EPC and MEP contractor in the country, the company has over 100 years of engineering excellence. Its key specialisations include Solar, Wind and Utility Projects, Mobility Solutions, ICT Systems, Electrical and Lighting, Fire Safety, Air Conditioning and Ventilation, Plumbing and Gas, Security and Communication, Audio-Visual Integration, UPS and Battery Backup, Facilities Management, Architectural Drawings and 3D Visualisation, Industrial Accessories Trading and Hydro Solutions. Renowned for innovation and exceptional client service, the company's main aim is to provide sustainable and innovative engineering services for a better life. Estimation Engineer The ideal candidate will be a detail-oriented and analytical Estimation Engineer with proven experience in air conditioning (HVAC) projects. The role involves preparing accurate cost estimates, BOQS, and technical and commercial proposals for residential, commercial, and industrial HVAC projects. The position requires close coordination with design, procurement, and project execution teams. Job Responsibilities Prepare detailed cost estimates for HVAC/AC projects based on drawings, specifications, and tender documents. Perform quantity take-offs for HVAC systems, including chillers, VRF/VRV, DX units, ducting, piping, insulation, controls, and accessories. Develop Bills of Quantities (BOQS) and material cost breakdowns. Analyse vendor quotations and prepare comparative statements. Review tender documents, scope of work, and technical requirements. Prepare technical and commercial proposals in line with client specifications. Identify risks, assumptions, exclusions, and value-engineering options. Coordinate with sales and management during tender submissions and negotiations. Liaise with design, procurement, and project teams to validate estimates. Support value engineering and cost optimisation without compromising performance or standards. Assist in post-award budget finalization and cost control planning. Ensure estimates comply with ASHRAE, SMACNA, ISHRAE, and local authority standards. Maintain records of estimates, pricing databases, and historical project data. Candidate Profile Bachelor's degree or diploma in Mechanical Engineering or related field. Three to eight years of experience in HVAC/AC estimation for construction or MEP projects.  Hands-on experience with commercial, residential, or industrial HVAC systems. Strong knowledge of HVAC systems (chillers, AHUS, FCUs, VRF, and DX systems).  Proficiency in AutoCAD (for drawing review and quantity take-offs). Familiarity with estimation tools/software and MS Excel (advanced level preferred).  Understanding of HVAC materials, market rates, and supplier networks. Strong analytical and numerical skills. Excellent attention to detail and accuracy. Good communication and coordination skills. Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple bids simultaneously. Experience in high-value or fast-track projects. Knowledge of local authority approvals and tendering procedures. Exposure to EPC / Design & Build HVAC projects. title: HVAC කාර්මික
description: SAVE JOB HVAC කාර්මික | බත්තරමුල්ල සියලුම පහසුකම්වල ප්‍රශස්ත ක්‍රියාකාරිත්වය සහ සුවපහසුව සහතික කිරීම සඳහා heating, ventilation සහ වායු සමීකරණ පද්ධති ස්ථාපනය කිරීම, නඩත්තු කිරීම සහ අලුත්වැඩියා කිරීම HVAC කාර්මිකයා විසින් දරනු ලැබේ. ගැටළු හඳුනා ගැනීම, වැළැක්වීමේ නඩත්තුව සිදු කිරීම සහ ආරක්ෂාව සහ පාරිසරික ප්‍රමිතීන්ට අනුකූල වීම සහතික කිරීම මෙම භූමිකාවට ඇතුළත් වේ. වගකීම් වායු සමීකරණ, සිසිලන යන්ත්‍ර, සිසිලන කුළුණු, වාතාශ්‍රය ඒකක සහ වායු හැසිරවීමේ පද්ධති ඇතුළු HVAC පද්ධති ස්ථාපනය කිරීම, පරීක්ෂා කිරීම, නඩත්තු කිරීම සහ අලුත්වැඩියා කිරීම. උපකරණ කාර්යක්ෂමතාව සහතික කිරීම සහ අක්‍රිය කාලය අවම කිරීම සඳහා නිතිපතා වැළැක්වීමේ නඩත්තු කටයුතු සිදු කරන්න. HVAC පද්ධති සඳහා විදුලි හා යාන්ත්‍රික දෝෂ හඳුනා ගැනීම සහ අවශ්‍ය අලුත්වැඩියාවන් සිදු කිරීම. පද්ධති පාලන සකස් කිරීම සහ තාප ස්ථාය, කපාට සහ පීඩන ස්විච ක්‍රමාංකනය කිරීම. සියලුම HVAC පද්ධති බලශක්ති කාර්යක්ෂමතා ප්‍රමිතීන් සහ ආරක්ෂක රෙගුලාසිවලට අනුකූලව ක්‍රියාත්මක වන බව සහතික කිරීම. නිවැරදි නඩත්තු ලොග් සහ සේවා වාර්තා පවත්වා ගැනීම. නඩත්තු ඉල්ලීම් සහ හදිසි අවස්ථා සඳහා කඩිනමින් ප්‍රතිචාර දැක්වීම. බලශක්ති ඉතිරිකිරීමේ මුලපිරීම් සඳහා සහාය වීම සහ විභව වැඩිදියුණු කිරීම් වාර්තා කිරීම. අවශ්‍යතා වායු සමීකරණ සහ ශීතකරණය, යාන්ත්‍රික ඉංජිනේරු විද්‍යාව හෝ අදාළ ක්ෂේත්‍රය පිළිබඳ සහතිකයක් හෝ ඩිප්ලෝමාවක්. HVAC ස්ථාපනය සහ නඩත්තුව පිළිබඳ අවම වශයෙන් අවුරුදු 2-3 ක පළපුරුද්දක්. HVAC පද්ධති, විදුලි සංරචක සහ ආරක්ෂක ක්‍රියා පටිපාටි පිළිබඳ හොඳ දැනුමක්. තාක්ෂණික රූප සටහන් සහ අත්පොත් කියවීමේ හැකියාව. ශක්තිමත් ගැටළු විසඳීමේ සහ දෝශ නිරාකරණ කුසලතා. හොඳ සන්නිවේදනය සහ කණ්ඩායම් වැඩ කුසලතා. අවශ්‍ය නම් සති අන්ත ඇතුළුව නම්‍යශීලී වේලාවන් වැඩ කිරීමට ඇති කැමැත්ත XpressJobs හරහා ඔබේ CV යැවීමට කරුණාකර අයදුම් කිරීමේ බොත්තම ක්ලික් කරන්න. title: Electrical Engineering
description: SAVE JOB Hayleys Group is amongst Sri Lanka's largest, and most respected diversified conglomerates with a turnover in excess of USD 1 Billion. FENTONS LIMITED Founded in 1919, Hayleys Fentons Limited is one of Sri Lanka's first engineering companies. As the No.1 Solar EPC and MEP contractor in the country, the company has over 100 years of engineering excellence. Its key specialisations include Solar, Wind and Utility Projects, Mobility Solutions, ICT Systems, Electrical and Lighting, Fire Safety, Air Conditioning and Ventilation, Plumbing and Gas, Security and Communication, Audio-Visual Integration, UPS and Battery Backup, Facilities Management, Architectural Drawings and 3D Visualisation, Industrial Accessories Trading and Hydro Solutions. Renowned for innovation and exceptional client service, the company's main aim is to provide sustainable and innovative engineering services for a better life. Electrical Engineering Intern The Electrical Engineering Intern will work closely with senior electrical engineers and project teams to support the planning, design, installation, testing, operation, and maintenance of electrical systems and equipment. The intern will gain hands-on exposure to real-world engineering projects across various stages of execution while applying academic knowledge to practical challenges. Job Responsibilities Assist in the design and analysis of electrical systems, circuits, and components. Support the installation, testing, troubleshooting, and maintenance of electrical equipment.  Prepare technical drawings, schematics, and documentation. Conduct data collection, measurements, and basic electrical calculations. Assist in testing and validating electrical systems for performance and safety. Participate in project meetings and contribute to engineering discussions. Ensure compliance with electrical codes, standards, and safety regulations. Collaborate with senior engineers, technicians, and cross-functional teams. Candidate Profile Currently pursuing or has recently completed a Diploma or Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field. Basic understanding of electrical circuits, power systems, and control systems. Familiarity with electrical tools, measuring instruments, and testing equipment. Knowledge of software such as AutoCAD, MATLAB, ETAP, or similar software (preferred). Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Good communication and teamwork abilities. Willingness to learn and take direction from senior engineers PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR DETAILS VIA XPRESSJOBS View Job Ad

title: Junior Electrician
description: SAVE JOB Junior Electrician WE ARE Richardson Outdoor (Pvt) Limited is Sri Lanka's only truly multi-platformed outdoor advertising company. The company was formed in 1998 with the primary purpose of becoming the country's leading Out-of Home Media specialist. Today we are the number one outdoor advertising company ventured in to offering our clients a plethora of advertising platforms such as Gantries, Bus Shelters, Hoardings, Street Name Boards, Billboards and LED Gantries. An exciting role has arisen for a dynamic; result oriented, highly motivated and committed team player with positive attitude to join our Outdoor Team. Job Responsibilities Carry out electrical installations, service, and maintenance tasks as directed by supervisors and engineers. Maintain accurate records of all completed work, with appropriate approvals. Ensure timely completion of installation, servicing, and maintenance assignments within the given deadlines. Uphold high standards of workmanship include neat component mounting, proper cabling, and secure electrical connections.  Requirements: NVQ Level 3 or higher certification in Electrical Engineering. Minimum of 3 years' hands-on experience in installation, servicing, and fault rectification of electrical systems. Strong attention to detail and the ability to identify and address substandard work. A proactive team player with the ability to work independently with minimal supervision. Self-disciplined and organized, particularly in maintaining tools and storage areas. Willingness to travel for work; owning a bike and holding a valid motorcycle license is a must NOTE: ABILITY TO WORK LATE IN THE EVENINGS & BEING FLEXIBLE FOR WORK IS A KEY REQUIREMENT FOR THE POSITION  An attractive remuneration package together with excellent prospects for career advancement awaits the successful candidate. ONLY SHORT LISTED CANDIDATES WILL BE CONTACTED PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS View Job Ad

title: Sales Engineer
description: SAVE JOB Hayleys Group is amongst Sri Lanka's largest, and most respected diversified conglomerates with a turnover in excess of USD 1 Billion. FENTONS LIMITED Founded in 1919, Hayleys Fentons Limited is one of Sri Lanka's first engineering companies. As the No.1 Solar EPC and MEP contractor in the country, the company has over 100 years of engineering excellence. Its key specialisations include Solar, Wind and Utility Projects, Mobility Solutions, ICT Systems, Electrical and Lighting, Fire Safety, Air Conditioning and Ventilation, Plumbing and Gas, Security and Communication, Audio-Visual Integration, UPS and Battery Backup, Facilities Management, Architectural Drawings and 3D Visualisation, Industrial Accessories Trading and Hydro Solutions. Renowned for innovation and exceptional client service, the company's main aim is to provide sustainable and innovative engineering services for a better life. Sales Engineer The Sales Engineer is responsible for promoting and selling solar panel boards and related renewable energy solutions. This role combines technical expertise with sales capabilities to identify customer needs, provide effective solar solutions, and contribute to business growth in the renewable energy sector. Job Responsibilities Promote and sell electrical panel boards (including LT/HT panels, PCCs, MCCs, distribution boards, etc.). Identify new business opportunities and develop new clients. Manage and grow relationships with existing customers, consultants, and contractors. Prepare technical and commercial proposals, quotations, and tenders. Coordinate with design, production, and project teams to ensure customer requirements are met. Conduct site visits, product presentations, and technical discussions. Achieve sales targets and provide regular sales reports and market feedback. Candidate Profile Bachelor's degree or diploma in Electrical Engineering (or a related field). Two to five years of experience in panel board or electrical equipment sales. Strong understanding of electrical drawings, specifications, and standards. Excellent communication, negotiation, and presentation skills. Ability to work independently and handle multiple projects. Willingness to travel for client meetings and site visits. PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS View Job Ad

title: Project Engineer - CAPEX Projects
description: SAVE JOB Come join our team as a  Project Engineer - CAPEX Projects  What you need to do  Oversee capital expenditure (CAPEX) projects from inception to completion.  Develop detailed project plans, timelines, and budget estimates.  Coordinate with cross-functional teams to ensure efficient project execution.  Manage engineering tasks related to construction, installation, and commissioning.  Monitor project progress, identify risks, and implement mitigation strategies.  Conduct feasibility studies and prepare technical reports.  Ensure compliance with safety, quality and performance standards at all times.  Optimize operational processes for improved efficiency and effectiveness.  Manage contractor/vendor relationships and oversee work to ensure standards.  Control and track project costs to stay  and meet deadlines.  What we are looking for  Strong skills in Project Engineering, Project Management, and Project Planning to efficiently handle and execute projects.  Proficiency in Electrical Engineering to design, analyze, and implement technical solutions effectively.  Excellent Communication skills for seamless collaboration with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.  Ability to take a proactive approach to problem-solving and adapt to challenging environments.  Bachelor's degree in Engineering preferably with focus on Electrical or Project Engineering  Previous experience in similar engineering or project management roles is an advantage.  All applications will be treated confidentially. Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.  PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS View Job Ad

title: Application Engineer - Professional Lighting
description: SAVE JOB Hayleys Group is amongst Sri Lanka's largest, and most respected diversified conglomerates with a turnover in excess of USD 1 Billion.  FENTONS LIMITED Founded in 1919, Hayleys Fentons Limited is one of Sri Lanka's first engineering companies. As the No.1 Solar EPC and MEP contractor in the country, the company has over 100 years of engineering excellence. Its key specialisations include Solar, Wind and Utility Projects, Mobility Solutions, ICT Systems, Electrical and Lighting, Fire Safety, Air Conditioning and Ventilation, Plumbing and Gas, Security and Communication, Audio-Visual Integration, UPS and Battery Backup, Facilities Management, Architectural Drawings and 3D Visualisation, Industrial Accessories Trading and Hydro Solutions. Renowned for innovation and exceptional client service, the company's main aim is to provide sustainable and innovative engineering services for a better life. Application Engineer - Professional Lighting The Application Engineer - Professional Lighting will be responsible for providing technical expertise, designing lighting solutions, and supporting clients in the selection and implementation of professional lighting systems. The role involves close collaboration with sales teams, project teams, and clients to deliver high-quality, innovative, and energy-efficient lighting solutions. Design and recommend lighting systems in line with project requirements, regulations, and industry standards. Prepare technical documentation, drawings, and specifications for lighting projects. Collaborate closely with sales and project teams to ensure the successful implementation of lighting solutions. Conduct product demonstrations, training sessions, and workshops for clients and internal stakeholders. Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to lighting systems. Stay up to date with industry trends, emerging technologies, and professional lighting standards. Candidate Profile Bachelor's degree in electrical engineering, Lighting Design, or a related field. 1-3 years' experience in professional lighting, electrical systems, or a related role. Strong knowledge of lighting technologies, standards, and applications. Proficiency in lighting design software such as DIALux or Relux, and AutoCAD. title: Specialist - Power System Planning & Projects
description: SAVE JOB Specialist - Power System Planning & Projects Job Purpose:  This role is responsible for identifying new technologies, breakthrough solutions, and new products to be implemented in the telecommunication network while ensuring energy saving, improving operational efficiency, and achieving the lowest Total Cost of Ownership (TCO). Additionally, the role involves providing technical recommendations and standard practices for telecommunication tower electrical and earthing scope, preparing guideline documents for regional and vendor teams based on IEC and TRCSL guidelines. The Specialist will also execute special projects related to power system optimization and manage power material infrastructure and inventory control. The Job: Identify new technologies, breakthrough solutions, and new products for implementation in the telecommunication network, ensuring energy savings, operational efficiency, and lowest TCO. Monitor the performance of new technology/product POCs and provide technical recommendations for network-wide rollout at candidate sites. Focus on renewable energy technologies and solutions for the telecommunication industry. Provide technical recommendations and standard practices for telecommunication tower electrical and earthing scope, and prepare guideline documents for regional and vendor teams based on IEC and TRCSL guidelines. Identify sites and map solutions for special project execution and manage power system procurement, delivery follow-up, and deployment. Monitor power material utilization for project CTL/CI, prepare demand and procurement plans for planning requirements and buffer stock for urgent project activity execution. Maintain project-related material stock details with in/out records and conduct physical checks at the warehouse. Revise inventory levels monthly against in-house project schedules. Ensure proper design of surge protection and grounding systems for all access sites and provide recommendations for lightning and surge protection improvements. Serve as a core member of the procurement committee by preparing technical specifications, conducting technical evaluations, engaging in vendor discussions, and preparing procurement papers. Ensure adherence to all internal and ISO processes by maintaining and updating required documents and implementing processes. The Person: Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Energy Management, or a similar field from a recognized local or international university. More than 4 years of work experience in the energy or power domain. Deep knowledge of telecom power structure planning and operation. Experience in vendor/partner management. Exceptional communication, verbal, written, and presentation skills. Strong business thinking and acumen. Leadership and strategic thinking capabilities. Seniority and credibility in the field. Exemplary ethics and corporate social responsibility. Experience in power-saving projects, renewable power sector, and building management. Experience in project management. PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS

title: Executive ‐ Technical
description: SAVE JOB Executive ‐ Technical  (BASED AT BIYAGAMA) The Activewear Value Stream delivers high-performance sportswear and athleisure solutions designed for technical functionality, durability and everyday versatility— serving sports, lifestyle and performance segments. With a strong focus on innovation, MAS is advancing wearable technology that tracks fitness and workout analytics while blending advanced sportswear with fashion and aesthetic appeal. Operating across Sri Lanka, Jordan and Indonesia, and with development centres in Sri Lanka and Canada, Activewear serves a global customer base that includes Nike, lululemon, Patagonia, Ralph Lauren and Gymshark. The Activewear product range offers diverse solutions such as Knit, Fleece, Tees, Woven, Sweaters, Engineered Knit. As a unified platform, the Activewear Value Stream combines global scale, speed and technical expertise, positioning MAS as a trusted partner for innovative, performance and lifestyle apparel. Empower transformation by becoming a driving force of change at MAS. We are on the lookout for a dedicated individual to oversee the operation of the allocated sewing lines at the Product Development Centre incorporating most effective and efficient methods, encouraging QCO activities, ensuring proper information transfer from technical to operation, whilst guiding and motivating the sewing machine operators in order to ensure samples are sewn and delivered to the customer in a timely and accurate manner as per customer standards/ requirements. KEY RESPONSIBILITIES Analyze the design sketch/ development meeting questioner and understand the requirement, thereby discuss the production feasibility of same, critical construction/workmanship, folders/attachment required, technical specification and cost-effective methods of developing the same. Oversee style handover meeting, tech pack receiving, sketches and other relevant documents from Garment tech, discuss with relevant persons such as the Industrial Engineering team, mechanic, pattern maker etc. Transfer all development information of styles to the production teams, highlight critical requirements, challenges, special conditions as and when required in order to ensure the smooth functioning of the production process in order to satisfy customer requirements. Follow up on the timely development/ completion of garments by providing constant feedback to the Garment techs, sample room, address concerns related to construction, usage of material etc. thereby ensuring that the development samples meet the requirements of the customer. Ensure initial fit review process is effectively conducted by cross checking the garment construction/ aesthetics with the requirements of the customer, provide relevant feedback on amendments and corrections whilst following up with the relevant teams on the completion of same. Finalize amendments in garment according to feasibility by identifying and manipulate methods on conducting adjustments in pattern whilst guiding the Garment techs in accommodating such changes into the garment to meet customer expectations. Ensure awareness & compliance of team regarding all organizational standards in areas such as Health and Safety, Fire Safety, 5S, Housekeeping, Standards given under MAS Labour Compliance & Customer Compliance etc. whilst, assisting in Projects/ initiatives, including MOS related activities within the team. Oversee the MOS functions within the team, ensure that appropriate organizational standards are maintained and improved as per specification, conduct weekly audits and identify improvement areas, thereby preparing the team for MOS assessments. Ensure that the environment, safety and health standards of the organization are adhered to while actively contribute towards promoting a culture of safety and environmental consciousness within and outside the organization.  KNOWLEDGE AND SKILLS Degree/ National Diploma in Textile from a relevant institute. 1-2 Years’ experience in a similar role. Must have sewing skills. Sound Technical knowledge. Basic pattern making and grading knowledge. Machinery and attachment awareness. title: Head of AI Solutions
description: SAVE JOB Head of AI Solutions Job Purpose: The Head of AI Solutions is the CXO-1 accountable owner for translating business priorities into scalable, production-grade AI solutions that deliver measurable value. This role bridges business strategy and technology execution by owning the end-to-end lifecycle of AI solutions—prioritization, feasibility, solution architecture, build, deployment, adoption, and ongoing operations (L2/L3)—ensuring solutions are adopted by Business Units and continuously deliver outcomes (revenue uplift, cost reduction, experience improvement, EBITDA impact). As the Solutioning Front, this role leads early engagement with Business Owners, shapes the AI portfolio, and ensures downstream integration with IT systems and channels. The role also provides SME leadership for enterprise GenAI adoption (licensed/purchased tools and platforms), ensuring safe, consistent, and value-driven implementation across the organization. The Job: Establish and execute an operating model for AI solution delivery that drives speed-to-value, quality, scalability, and adoption across the organization. Own the AI Solutions Portfolio: intake, prioritization, roadmap, governance, delivery sequencing, and value tracking aligned to enterprise priorities. Accountable for end-to-end solution lifecycle: planning, architecture/design, build, testing, deployment, monitoring, and maintenance with L2/L3 support. Drive value realization: define KPIs and success metrics per solution, ensure instrumentation is in place, track benefits, and take corrective actions to secure outcomes. Lead and mentor multi-disciplinary teams across AI Model Development, AI DevOps/MLOps, and AI Application Development to deliver consistently high-quality outputs. Ensure AI solutions are engineered and operated to production standards (reliability, performance, security, cost efficiency, scalability, resilience). Own model operations and performance management: monitoring, drift detection, retraining triggers, release management, incident/problem management, and continuous improvement. Lead strong stakeholder management and delivery governance across key business domains (e.g., GBO, GSD, Enterprise, National Sales, Digital Adoption), ensuring readiness for adoption and operational ownership. Provide SME leadership for the GenAI pillar: support the organization on GenAI tools/platforms that are purchased/licensed, define implementation patterns, and ensure safe and value-led adoption. Ensure delivery of solutions that comply with required security, privacy, and governance standards, embedding responsible AI practices into delivery and operations. Postgraduate qualification (MBA/MSc) is an advantage but not mandatory 10+ years relevant experience in AI/analytics, data, software, or digital product domains, with demonstrable leadership responsibility. Proven track record of delivering AI/ML solutions into production and running them at scale, including monitoring, lifecycle management, and operational support. Strong experience bridging business and technology: problem framing, translating requirements into solution designs, managing dependencies, and driving adoption/value realization. Solid understanding of modern AI delivery concepts: MLOps/CI-CD, model monitoring, APIs/microservices, data pipelines, cloud platforms, and integration patterns. Working knowledge of ML/NLP (and practical familiarity with GenAI/LLM application patterns) with the judgement to apply “right-tech/right-model” pragmatically. title: Call Recording Analyst I Work From Home
description: SAVE JOB Call Recording Analyst | Work from Home Call Recording Analyst is responsible for reviewing and analyzing recorded calls of assigned clients in the call tracking account to provide stats on inbound calls and monitoring interactions, providing insights, and delivering tips to enhance the potential new patient conversion rates. This schedule may require adjusting your daily routine, so consider your comfort with late-night or early-morning work. EPF/ETF: Enrollment in Sri Lanka’s employee provident and trust funds. Legal Compliance: Adherence to the Sri Lankan Shop and Office Act. Salary: Starting at 70,000 LKR (including basic pay and allowances), with a potential increment after a 6-month probation. title: Occupational Therapist
description: SAVE JOB Occupational Therapist Responsibilities Conduct thorough evaluations of patients’ functional abilities and  develop comprehensive treatment plans. Deliver personalized occupational therapy interventions aimed at  enhancing patients’ ability to perform daily activities  independently. Educate patients and their families on strategies and techniques to  facilitate recovery and improve quality of life. Work closely with a multidisciplinary team, including physicians,  nurses, and Physiotherapist, to coordinate holistic care for all  patients. Maintain accurate and timely records of patient evaluations, treatment plans, and progress notes in accordance with regulatory standards. Qualifications A Bachelor’s degree or Higher national diploma in Occupational Therapy from an accredited institution. Should be registered with the Sri Lanka Medical Council (SLMC) Salary : LKR 60,000 – 100,000 PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS Address – 37, Frances Road, Colombo – 06

title: Full-Time Caregiver / Nurse Assistant
description: SAVE JOB Full-Time Caregiver / Nurse Assistant | Malabe  Location: Malabe, Sri Lanka  Employment Type: Live-in, Full-Time   Salary (including allowances, based on experience): LKR 50,000 - 70,000 LKR / month  About the Company  Blanket Care is an assisted living service designed to enhance the quality of life for seniors by integrating personalised medical care and lifestyle support, ensuring a safe, nurturing, and engaging environment that promotes independence, well-being, and dignity.  About the Role:  We are looking for a compassionate and dedicated Caregiver to join our newly established care home in Malabe, as well as to our clients in their own homes. You will play a crucial role in enhancing the quality of life for elderly residents by providing attentive care and ensuring a safe and comfortable environment.  Key Responsibilities:  Assist residents with daily activities such as bathing, dressing, grooming, and mobility support.  Assist with feeding and hydration, ensuring proper nutrition for residents.  Monitor residents’ vital signs and report any changes in health conditions to the nurse or doctor.  Help with medication reminders and ensure residents follow their prescribed treatment plans.  Provide companionship and emotional support, fostering a caring and respectful environment.  Support hygiene and infection control practices within the care home. Help reposition and transfer residents to prevent bedsores and ensure comfort.  Light housekeeping centered around the patient to maintain clean and safe living spaces for residents.  Respond promptly to resident calls and emergency situations, following proper protocols. Qualifications & Experience:  A certificate or diploma in caregiving, nursing, nurse assistance, or a related field.  NVQ Level 3 or higher or equivalent certification.  Minimum of 2 years of experience in elderly care, home care, or a healthcare facility.  Training in basic first aid and emergency response is an advantage.  Ability to handle physically demanding tasks like assisting with mobility and lifting.  Compassionate, patient, and empathetic towards elderly individuals.  Strong communication skills and the ability to work well in a team.  Work Schedule & Availability:  Live-in role, following a 2-weeks-on, 4-days-off rotation to ensure continuous care.  Compensation & Benefits:  Competitive salary based on experience and qualifications.  Accommodation, meals, and uniforms are provided.  Performance Bonus - Up to 10,000 LKR  Performance Bonus Eligibility Criteria  Resident satisfaction  Medication administration accuracy  Resident safety and comfort during night hours  Proper shift handover and documentation  Responsiveness to emergencies and night-time issues  Team collaboration and punctuality  Professional development opportunities in training in elderly and palliative care.  If you are a caring and reliable individual passionate about elderly care, we encourage you to apply.  PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS

Maintain accurate, detailed medical records, ensuring proper documentation of all nursing activities in line with hospital standards.
