description: SAVE JOB හරිතාගාර නඩත්තු ක්‍රියාකරු (පිරිමි) අපත් සමඟ එකතු වන්න. Glorious Holdings (Pvt) Ltd, වැවිලි, වැවිලි කළමනාකරණය, දේපළ වෙළඳාමි, විකුණුමි සහ අලෙවිකරණ විසඳුම් සපයන සමාගමකි. හරීතාගාර, කෙටි කාලීන සහ දිගු කාලීන බෝග, සහ වෙනත් ලාභදායී වැවිලි ව්‍යාපෘති හඳුන්වා දීමට අපි විශේෂඥයෝ වෙමු. රැකියා කාර්යභාරය පොලිතීන් ගෘහ තුළ සිදු වන දෛනික කාර්යන් සහ තවාන් පැළ සිටුවීම, වගා මළු තුළ ශාක නැවත සිටුවීම, ශාක කප්පාදුව, පොහොර හා ජලය සැපයීම රෝග පළිබෝධ පාලනය, වල් පැල පාලනය ඇතුළු තවාන් පාලනය හා අනෙකුත් සාත්තු ක්‍රියා සඳහා ශ්‍රම දායකත්වය සැපයීම. පොලිතීන් ගෘහ තුළ ප්‍රශස්ත මට්ටමින් ආලෝකය, උෂ්ණත්වය හා ආර්ද්‍රතාවය පවත්වා ගැනීමට අදාළ නඩත්තු කටයුතු සිදුකිරීම. බෝග සංස්ථාපනයට ප්‍රථම, බෝග වර්ධනයට අදාළ උෂ්ණත්වය, ආලෝක තීව්‍රතාව, ආර්ද්‍රතාවය සහ ශාකයේ පෝෂණ අවශ්‍යතා සලකා බැලීම මෙන්ම රෝපණ ද්‍රව්‍ය වල රෝග පළිබෝධ හා යාන්ත්‍රික හානි පිළිබඳ පරීක්ෂා කර බැලීම. බෝග වගාවට අදාල දත්ත සටහන් කර ගැනීම සහ වාර්තා පවත්වාගෙන යෑම (අක්‍රමිකතා ඇත්නම් සුපරීක්ෂක හෝ ව්‍යාපෘති භාර නිලධාරී දැනුවත් කිරීම). කෘමිනාශක යෙදීම ,මිහිදුම් ජල ප්‍රචාරක ක්‍රියාකරවීම ,ශාක වලට සෙවන සැපයීම, සහ තවාන් ධූමකරණ ක්‍රියාවලි සඳහා දායක වීම. පොලිතීන් ගෘහ තුළ සිදු වන කාර්යභාරයන් දෛනික චර්යාවකට අනුකූලව සිදු කිරීම, පවත්වාගෙන යෑම සහ නවීන මාදිලියේ කෘෂි උපකරණ භාවිතා කිරීම. ජල සැපයුම් පාලන ඒකක, හරිතාගාර තුළ අදාළ පාලන ව්‍යුහ, මිහිඳුම් ජල ප්‍රචාරණ ඒකක ඇතුළු විද්‍යුත් උපාංග සැකසීම, ක්‍රියා කරවීම සහ නඩත්තු කිරීම.  වැඩබිම පිරිසිදුව තබාගැනීම හා නඩත්තුව. සුදුසුකම් වයස අවුරුදු 18 ත් 25 ත් අතර විය යුතුයි. පිරිමි අයදුම්කරුවන් සලකා බැලේ. හරිතාගාර ක්‍රියාවලි පිළිබඳ අවම වශයෙන් වසරක පලපුරුද්ද අතිරේක සුදුසුකම් ලෙස සැලකේ. සුපරීක්ෂක විසින් පවරන කාණ්‍යයන් සහ අදාල ඉලක්ක සපුරාලීම. විශ්ලේෂණ කුසලතා. පීඩාකාරී තත්ව යටතේ වුවද වැඩ කිරීමට ඇති හැකියාව. XPRESSJOBS හරහා ඔබගේ CV එක යැවීමට කරුණාකර අයදුම් කරන්න බොත්තම ක්ලික් කරන්න. Greenhouse Maintenance Operator (Male) Join us. Glorious Holdings (Pvt) Ltd is a company that provides plantation, plantation management, real estate, sales and marketing solutions. We specialize in introducing greenhouses, short-term and long-term crops, and other profitable plantation projects. Job Duties To provide labor input for daily tasks in polythene houses and nursery planting, replanting plants in cultivation gardens, pruning plants, providing fertilizer and watering, pest control, weed control, and other nursery management and care activities. To perform maintenance activities related to maintaining optimal light, temperature and humidity levels in polythene houses. Before crop establishment, consider the temperature, light intensity, humidity and nutritional requirements of the plant as well as inspect the planting material for pests, diseases and mechanical damage. Recording data related to crop cultivation and maintaining records (informing the supervisor or project officer in case of irregularities). Applying pesticides, operating groundwater spreaders, providing shade to plants, and contributing to nursery fumigation processes. Performing and maintaining tasks in polythene houses in accordance with a daily routine and using modern agricultural equipment. Setting up, operating and maintaining electrical devices including water supply control units, relevant control structures in greenhouses, groundwater spreaders. Keeping the workplace clean and maintained. Qualifications Must be between 18 and 25 years of age. Male applicants will be considered. At least one year of experience in greenhouse processes is considered an additional qualification. Achieving the tasks and relevant targets assigned by the supervisor. Analytical skills. Ability to work even under stressful conditions PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS View Job Ad

PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS ඔබේ රැකියාව කරන අතරතුරම, අසීමිත ආදායමකට මගක්!  දැනට රැකියාවක නියුතු ඔබට, ඔබේ මාසික වැටුපට අමතරව ඉහළ අතිරේක ආදායමක් උපයා ගැනීමට ලැබෙන අනගි අවස්ථාවකි. ලොව අංක 1 රක්ෂණ සන්නාමය වන AIA Insurance සමඟින් අදම එක්වන්න! මූල්‍ය සැලසුම්කරණ නිලධාරී (අර්ධකාලීන) අපෙන් ඔබට ලැබෙන වරප්‍රසාද: අසීමිත ආදායම: ඔබ කැපවන ප්‍රමාණය අනුව සීමාවකින් තොරව ඉපයීමේ හැකියාව. මසකට දෙවරක් ගෙවීම්: මාසික වැටුපට අමතරව, මසකට දෙවතාවක් ලැබෙන මූල්‍ය දිරිගැන්වීම්. විදේශ සංචාර: දක්ෂතාවය මත නොමිලේ හිමිවන දේශීය සහ විදේශීය සංචාර. නම්‍යශීලී සේවා කාලය: ඔබේ ප්‍රධාන රැකියාවට බාධාවක් නොවන පරිදි ඔබ කැමති වේලාවක වැඩ කිරීමේ හැකියාව. වෘත්තීය පුහුණුව: ක්ෂේත්‍රයේ ප්‍රවීණයන්ගෙන් ලැබෙන උසස් පුහුණුව සහ පිළිගැනීම. සුදුසුකම්: අපොස උසස් පෙළ (A/L) පෙනී සිට තිබීම. වයස අවුරුදු 21 ට වැඩි වීම. අන් අය සමඟ සුහදව අදහස් හුවමාරු කිරීමේ හැකියාව. "සිහින සැබෑ කරගන්න තවදුරටත් මාස අවසානය තෙක් බලා සිටිය යුතු නැත!" ගුරු වෘත්තියේ නියුතු ඔබට, ගුරු ගෞරවය රැකගෙන අමතර ආදායමක්! ගුරුවරයෙකු ලෙස ඔබ සතු අන් අයට මගපෙන්වීමේ සහ කරුණු පැහැදිලි කරදීමේ සහජ දක්ෂතාවය, AIA රක්ෂණ සමාගමේ මූල්‍ය සැලසුම්කරණ නිලධාරී තනතුර සඳහා කදිමට ගැලපේ. ඔබේ ගුරු සේවයට බාධාවක් නොවන පරිදි, අමතර කාලය ඵලදායී ලෙස යොදවා ඉහළ ආදායමක් උපයා ගැනීමට මෙය කදිම අවස්ථාවකි ප්‍රධාන වගකීම් සහ කාර්යයන්: පාරිභෝගිකයන් හඳුනා ගැනීම: ඔබේ පෞද්ගලික සබඳතා සහ විවිධ මාර්ග ඔස්සේ මූල්‍ය සැලසුම් අවශ්‍ය පාරිභෝගිකයන් සොයා ගැනීම. අවශ්‍යතා විශ්ලේෂණය: පාරිභෝගිකයාගේ වර්තමාන මූල්‍ය තත්ත්වය, විශ්‍රාම සැලසුම්, දරුවන්ගේ අධ්‍යාපනය සහ සෞඛ්‍ය අවශ්‍යතා පිළිබඳව සාකච්ඡා කිරීම. විසඳුම් ඉදිරිපත් කිරීම: AIA ආයතනය සතු විවිධ රක්ෂණ සහ ආයෝජන සැලසුම් අතරින් පාරිභෝගිකයාට වඩාත්ම ගැළපෙන සැලසුම නිර්දේශ කිරීම. සබඳතා පවත්වා ගැනීම: දැනට සිටින පාරිභෝගිකයන් සමඟ නිරන්තරයෙන් සම්බන්ධ වෙමින් ඔවුන්ගේ ගැටලු විසඳීම සහ වාරික ගෙවීම් දිරිමත් කිරීම. ලේඛන කටයුතු: නව රක්ෂණ ඔප්පු සඳහා අවශ්‍ය ලිපිලේඛන නිවැරදිව සම්පූර්ණ කිරීම සහ හිමිකම් පෑම් (Claims) වලදී පාරිභෝගිකයාට මගපෙන්වීම. අවශ්‍ය සුදුසුකම්: අධ්‍යාපනය: අපොස උසස් පෙළ (A/L) සමත් වී තිබීම (වෙනත් වෘත්තීය සුදුසුකම් අමතර වාසියකි). අත්දැකීම්: විකුණුම් හෝ අලෙවිකරණ ක්ෂේත්‍රයේ පළපුරුද්දක් ඇත්නම් විශේෂත්වයකි (නමුත් පළපුරුද්දක් නැති අයටද පුහුණුව ලබා දේ). පෞරුෂය: ප්‍රියමනාප පෙනුම සහ ඉතා හොඳින් අදහස් හුවමාරු කිරීමේ හැකියාව. කැපවීම: අභියෝග භාරගත හැකි, ස්වයංව වැඩ කළ හැකි ක්‍රියාශීලී අයෙකු වීම. මෙම තනතුර ගුරු වෘත්තියට ගැලපෙන්නේ ඇයි? මගපෙන්වන්නෙකු වීම: පන්ති කාමරයේදී සිසුන්ට මගපෙන්වනවා සේම, මෙහිදී ඔබ කරන්නේ පවුලක අනාගතය සුරක්ෂිත කරගන්නා ආකාරය පිළිබඳව වැඩිහිටියන්ට මගපෙන්වීමයි. පැහැදිලි කිරීමේ හැකියාව: රක්ෂණ සැලසුම් වල ඇති වැදගත්කම සහ තාක්ෂණික කරුණු සරලව පාරිභෝගිකයාට වටහා දීමට ගුරුවරයෙකුට ඇති හැකියාව අසමසමයි. විශ්වාසය සහ ගෞරවය: සමාජයේ ගුරුවරුන් කෙරෙහි ඇති ඉහළ පිළිගැනීම නිසා, මූල්‍ය උපදෙස් ලබා දීමේදී පාරිභෝගික විශ්වාසය දිනා ගැනීම ඔබට ඉතා පහසු වේ. ඔබේ කාර්යභාරය: මූල්‍ය සාක්ෂරතාවය ලබා දීම: රක්ෂණයක් සහ ඉතිරි කිරීමක් පුද්ගලයෙකුට වැදගත් වන්නේ ඇයිද යන්න පිළිබඳව පාරිභෝගිකයන් දැනුවත් කිරීම. අනාගතය සැලසුම් කිරීම: දරුවන්ගේ උසස් අධ්‍යාපනය, විවාහය සහ විශ්‍රාම කාලය සඳහා නිවැරදි මූල්‍ය සැලසුම් සකස් කර දීම. විසඳුම් ඉදිරිපත් කිරීම: පාරිභෝගිකයාගේ ආර්ථික ශක්තියට අනුව ගැලපෙන AIA රක්ෂණ ක්‍රමවේදයක් තෝරා දීම. ගුරුවරයෙකු ලෙස ඔබට ලැබෙන විශේෂ වාසි: නම්‍යශීලී කාලය: පාසල් කාලයෙන් පසුව හෝ නිවාඩු දිනවලදී පමණක් සේවය කිරීමේ හැකියාව. අමතර වැටුප්: ඔබේ මාසික ගුරු වැටුපට අමතරව, මසකට දෙවරක් ලැබෙන දිරි දීමනා සහ අසීමිත කොමිස් ආදායම. විදේශ සංචාර: ඔබේ දක්ෂතාවය මත, පාසල් නිවාඩු කාලයන්හිදී විදේශ සංචාර වල නිරත වීමට ලැබෙන අවස්ථාව. වෘත්තීය වර්ධනය: ලෝකයේ පිළිගත් මූල්‍ය උපදේශකයෙකු ලෙස ජාත්‍යන්තර සහතික සහ පුහුණුව ලැබීම. අවශ්‍ය සුදුසුකම්: ගුරු වෘත්තියේ හෝ අධ්‍යාපන ක්ෂේත්‍රයේ නියැලී සිටීම. හොඳින් අදහස් හුවමාරු කිරීමේ හැකියාව. අලුත් දෙයක් ඉගෙන ගැනීමට ඇති උනන්දුව. "ඔබේ ගුරු සේවයේ වටිනාකම මූල්‍යමය අතින් ඉහළ නංවා ගැනීමට අදම අප හා එක්වන්න." ඔබට ලැබෙන ප්‍රතිලාභ: නම්‍යශීලී බව: වෙනත් රැකියාවක නිරත වන අයෙකුට වුවද තමන්ට පහසු වේලාවක සේවය කිරීමේ අවස්ථාව. වැටුප් ක්‍රමය: ඔබ සිදුකරන සේවය මත පදනම් වූ අසීමිත කොමිස් ආදායම් සහ දිරි දීමනා. ද්වි-මාසික ගෙවීම්: මසකට දෙවරක් ඔබේ ගිණුමට මුදල් ලැබෙන ක්‍රමවේදය. පුහුණුව සහ පිළිගැනීම: ජාත්‍යන්තර මට්ටමේ පුහුණුවීම් සහ MDRT වැනි ලෝක මට්ටමේ සම්මාන දිනා ගැනීමේ අවස්ථාව. සංචාර: විදේශ සංචාර සහ දේශීය විනෝද චාරකා සඳහා සුදුසුකම් ලැබීමේ අවස්ථාව. title: Foreign Language Teacher - German (Full Time/Part Time)
description: SAVE JOB Foreign Language Teacher - German (Full Time/Part Time) | Colombo  Speak Our Language! At Lingoda, in partnership with GigaLingua Lanka, we are building bridges through life-changing language learning – connecting people around the world. As part of this collaboration, we are looking for dedicated teachers of German as a foreign language who would like to support international professionals on their path to linguistic and professional recognition in Germany. You will be supported by cutting-edge technology and a well-developed didactic curriculum from Lingoda to provide your learners with an effective, structured, and personalized learning experience. Would you like to contribute to a better society? Do you want to actively support international professionals on their journey to language and career recognition? Then you are exactly who we're looking for! What you bring: You are motivated, self-organized, and tech-savvy You teach with passion and have excellent communication skills You enjoy guiding learning processes in a professional and interactive way Your responsibilities: You teach trainees and professionals daily in Colombo, offline, in German at levels A1–B2, who will later move to Germany You use prepared Lingoda materials – preparation time is therefore minimal You write short monthly reports on participants' progress You actively contribute to the continuous improvement of processes in collaboration with the Lingoda team Requirements : You are reliable and have intercultural sensitivity You have German language skills at a native level (at least C1+) You have at least 1 year of experience teaching German as a Foreign Language (DaF) You are available part-time/full-time and live in Colombo What to expect at Lingoda: Attractive, above-average remuneration Exclusive collaboration with Lingoda: you teach only in their programs Comprehensive onboarding and support from the Lingoda team Opportunities for professional development and training Access to high-quality, pre-prepared teaching materials Long-term teaching engagement with dedicated learners Your opportunity to teach international students, contribute to a meaningful project, and be part of the future of language learning. We promote diversity and equal opportunities. All applicants are welcome – regardless of gender, origin, age, religion, disability, or sexual identity. Gender-related terms apply equally to all genders. PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS

title: Japanese Language Instructor - Gampaha / Tangalle /
description: SAVE JOB Japanese Language Instructor -  Gampaha  / Tangalle /  Colombo Branches Job Vacancy:  Japanese Language Teachers (Full-Time permanent) Location:  Gampaha , Tangalle and Colombo Branches Company:  Tsukuba Technical Promotion (Pvt) Ltd About Us : Founded in 2006, Tsukuba Technical Promotions (Pvt) Ltd is a Sri Lankan government-approved training and employment agency dedicated to preparing individuals for successful careers in Japan. In partnership with our counterpart company in Japan, Power Japan (Pvt) Ltd , we manage the complete process—from training and testing (language, vocational, medical) to documentation, visa facilitation, and placement—under frameworks like the Technical Intern Training Program (TITP) and the Specified Skilled Worker (SSW) Program. With over 19 years of experience, qualified instructors, and strong industry partnerships, Tsukuba empowers Sri Lankan youth with the skills, discipline, and confidence needed to succeed in Japan’s competitive workforce. Educational Qualifications - Passed JLPT N2 or above is mandatory (Excellent command of the Japanese language, with fluency in reading, writing, and speaking). Teaching Experience - Familiarity with JFT-Basic exam preparation and IroDori Japanese for Life textbooks is preferred. Familiarity with SSW skill test preparation across different fields (nursing care, agriculture, construction, airport ground handling, food service, building cleaning , automobile transportation and accomodation) is preferred What We Offer: Attractive remuneration package. Excellent career development opportunities. Professional and supportive working environment. Priority will be given to candidates who have lived in Japan and studied Japanese in Japan. title: Montessori and Daycare Assistant
description: SAVE JOB Montessori and Daycare Assistant | Thalawathugoda Blooming Montessori Academy in Thalawathugoda is seeking a passionate and dedicated Montessori and Daycare Assistants to join our nurturing team. Blooming Montessori Academy is thrilled to invite a passionate and dedicated individual to join our team as Assistants. We are committed to fostering a nurturing environment where both students and educators can flourish. This is a rewarding opportunity for someone who loves working with children and wants to support their development across both structured learning and daycare care. Location:  Thalawathugoda Key Responsibilities: Assist the Teachers in preparing and maintaining engaging Montessori materials and learning environments. Provide attentive supervision and ensure a safe, nurturing, and stimulating environment for all children during class and daycare hours. Support children's individual needs, fostering independence and positive social interactions. Help monitor and document children's progress and daily activities. Collaborate with the team to organize activities, special events, and maintain daily routines. Assist in the caregiving routines of the daycare, including meal times, rest periods, and play. Help maintain clean, orderly, and well-organized classrooms and play areas.   What We’re Looking For: A warm, approachable, and patient personality with a genuine passion for working with children. Prior experience in a childcare, daycare, or educational setting is a strong advantage. Basic understanding of child development and Montessori principles is preferred, but training will be provided for the right candidate. Proficiency in English; knowledge of Tamil is an advantage. Strong multitasking skills and the physical stamina to engage with active learners. Ability to work collaboratively as part of a supportive team. Willingness to learn and obtain first aid and CPR certification (if not already held). If you are enthusiastic about supporting young minds and contributing to a thriving community, we would love to hear from you. Let’s build a bright future together at Blooming Montessori! title: Debt Collector
description: SAVE JOB WE'RE RECRUITING FOR Debt Collector Key Responsibilities Tightly monitor debtor list and follow up on overdue debtors. Contact customers via telephone or email. Negotiate and agree on a settlement date or a workable repayment arrangement for overdue payments. Regular phone calls to overdue customers, to remind them of payments. Regular visits to overdue customers to ensure full recovery. Perform administrative work or other job functions related to collection and recoveries. Notify debtors by letter, email, or telephone call of upcoming or outstanding invoices Negotiate payment plans and settlements with debtors, including fixing terms and conditions Arrange for account statements to be forwarded to clients each month and update records when necessary Establish and maintain regular communications with clients to facilitate periodic payments Candidate Profile: Diploma in Credit Management or equivalent Minimum 1-2 years of experience in a similar capacity Excellent communication skills Ability to work under pressure Being confident and persistent Not be limited to the role of Debt Collector Just like how an acorn grows into a mighty oak tree, we have embarked on a journey of growth to become a leader in the industries we operate. The core businesses of Acorn Group are Aviation, Destination Management, Travel Services, and Hotel & Villa Management. We also have diversified into Freight & Logistics, Business Management Services, and Education Management. Acorn Group has a regional footprint, operating in Sri Lanka, Maldives, Thailand, and UAE. We have partnerships with premier travel and aviation service providers to provide the best-in-class experiences for our customers. As we expand our footprint regionally and move into new territories, our North Star is our commitment to curating seamless experiences for our clients, while leading the industry forward into a new and exciting age of travel. title: Senior Multimedia Content Creator & Community Manager
description: SAVE JOB Senior Multimedia Content Creator & Community Manager Location:  Dogstar Foundation, Negombo, Sri Lanka Reports to:  In-Country Director (Sri Lanka ) Dotted line:   Senior Copywriter (UK) Contract:  Full-time About Dogstar Foundation Dogstar Foundation is an internationally renowned NGO improving animals’ lives across Sri Lanka through humane sterilisation (CNVR), vaccination, treatment, and education. We build sustainable, locally led animal-welfare solutions and a compassionate society where every animal is treated with respect and kindness. Position Overview  Find and tell Dogstar stories from the field. You’ll source, interview, film, photograph, and edit compelling short-form content, then send five high-quality copy-led content pieces per week (with photos/video) to the UK team for final sign-off. You’ll also manage our Sinhala spay-neuter Facebook group and triage inbox enquiries related to Sri Lanka services. This role suits a proactive self-starter who thrives outside an office. Key Outputs (weekly) 5 content packets to the UK team (each includes: short caption/copy, photos and/or 15–60s reel/video, suggested hooks/CTAs, alt text, facts, and consent notes). 2–3 Reels/vertical videos (15–60s), plus stills/carousels to grow the content bank. Sinhala FB Group: daily moderation (Mon–Fri). Inbox & email triage: first reply within 1 business day; clear next step within 2 business days. DAM compliance: 100% of new assets uploaded and fully tagged within 48 hours. Core Responsibilities Photography & Videography Capture high-quality photos and video on mobile and/or DSLR, covering spay-neuter outreach, clinics, community engagement, and feeding programmes. Conduct short interviews; ensure informed consent and dignity at all times. Content Creation & Editing Conceptualise and produce engaging Instagram Reels, TikToks, and Facebook Reels, aligned to current trends and platform best practice. Edit in CapCut (or equivalent); export platform-ready formats and aspect ratios (9:16; 1:1/4:5 as needed). Prepare first-draft captions (English) and Sinhala subtitles/captions (Tamil is a plus). UK sign-off: deliver packages D-1/D-2 ahead of scheduled posts; implement edits within 4 UK business hours. Community & Inbox Management Own the Sinhala spay–neuter Facebook Group: approve/decline posts, remove spam, enforce rules, keep conversations helpful and respectful. Handle Facebook inbox and shared email for Sri Lanka service-user enquiries using templates and an escalation matrix (no remote diagnosis; emergencies to nearest vet). Digital Asset Management (DAM) Upload, name, and tag all new assets within 24 hours; attach captions, SRT subtitle files (EN/SI/TA where applicable), consent forms, and mark “Approved by UK” after sign-off. Public Engagement & Events Confidently engage with community members and pet owners at clinics and outreach events to capture the moments that matter. (Optional) Drone If experienced/licensed, use drones to capture aerial perspectives that enhance stories (not mandatory). Requirements (must-have) Sri Lankan National. Fluent in Sinhala and English (spoken and written); Tamil proficiency is a plus. Proven experience in photography/videography and short-form social editing (portfolio/links required). Ability to drive a tuk-tuk or ride a motorbike (moped) with a valid Sri Lankan licence and safely transport camera gear. Strong interpersonal skills; confident interviewing and interacting with the public. Passion for animal welfare and Dogstar’s mission; impeccable judgement on dignity and safeguarding. Highly self-motivated, organised, reliable and able to work independently and as part of a team. Flexibility for varied hours, including some weekends, based on field needs. Nice to Have Meta Business Suite familiarity; basic analytics (watch time, retention, saves/shares). Experience using Canva to edit photos/videos. Basic motion graphics/thumbnail design. Experience in charity, community health, veterinary or One Health contexts. KPIs (how success is measured) Throughput & timeliness: 5 content packets/week delivered D-1/D-2; 2–3 reels/week. DAM discipline: ≥95% of weekly assets uploaded and fully tagged within 24 hours; zero misfiled assets. Quality: ≥70% first-pass approvals from UK (≤1 edit round); zero safeguarding or privacy breaches. Community: Group prompts ≥2/week; first response to inbox/email within 1 business day ≥95%; spam removed within 2 business hours. Tools & Logistics CapCut (mobile/desktop), smartphone with gimbal/clip mics (and/or DSLR), Meta Business Suite, Google Drive/Docs/Sheets, SRT subtitle files, Dogstar DAM. Frequent field travel in Negombo/Gampaha and nearby areas. Additional Information Meals provided whilst on duty Uniform provided. (T-shirt) Career development and CPD opportunities. PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS View Job Ad Senior Multimedia Content Creator & Community Manager

title: Social Media Marketing
description: SAVE JOB Social Media Marketing  Our team is looking to hire a full-time Social Media Marketing specialist. In this capacity, you’ll steer our online presence, strategically shaping social media narratives to boost visibility, ignite engagement, and generate leads.  Join us in this exciting journey where innovation meets impact.  We are looking for someone who has solid experience with Canva/social media and who can proactively produce direct social media posts and engage with our audience. This position is not suitable for social media administrators/coordinators.  In this capacity, you will learn extensively about SEO, social media marketing, and neuroscience marketing. Our firm is continuously reinventing itself. This is a tremendous opportunity for someone looking to take their career to the next level. Responsibilities Execute a comprehensive social media strategy aligned with our brands. Curate compelling content across platforms (Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, TikTok, LinkedIn). Conceptualize visually appealing designs for digital media. Engage proactively with audience feedback, comments, messages, and reviews to foster an active online community. Maintain an organized social media calendar for strategic content. Qualifications Education: A degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field is essential. Experience: You should have 2-3 years of hands-on experience in the Social Media arena. Expertise: Developing social posts to engage our audience Graphic Design Skills: You have vast experience creating impactful, visually attractive posts and videos using Canva. Social Media Advertising Skills Communication Skills: Your written and verbal communication skills should be top-notch, with an eye for design and visual aesthetics. Craft compelling content tailored to specific audiences. Adaptability: Thrive in a fast-paced environment, managing multiple projects independently and collaboratively. Tech Requirements: Ensure you have a computer or laptop with a high-speed processor, reliable internet, and consistent power supply. Time Zone Flexibility: Be prepared to work in zone hours as assigned by the client. Ample Workspace: A comfortable, quiet working space with an office table and chair is also required. About Our Firm Our international management consulting firm is a boutique firm helping our worldwide clientele to start their business in the United States across several brands including Immigration BusinessPlan.Com, our main brand. We are thankful to have served over 4,000 clients for the last 20 years. We boast a nice, respectful working environment where our team members are nurturing their skills, growing multi-faceted, highly valuable experiences, and forming long-lasting friendships. Our staff retention rate is very high. Our success lies in the excellence of our human-size team and our culture. We take a great deal of time to look for the most suitable candidate to join our team because we want to make sure that we are the right firm for our new recruit and vice versa. Working with us means dealing with a new entrepreneur every day, constantly learning about different industries, and benefitting from diverse experiences. Our office enjoys a fast-paced environment where one cannot get bored. Our company praises team members’ initiatives, creativity, integrity, dedication, and hard work. The well-being and happiness of our team are a strong priority.  PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS

The ideal candidate will be fluent in English and Mandarin Chinese, adept at managing diverse tasks, and comfortable in a dynamic, cross-cultural environment. This position is based in Sri Lanka and serves as a crucial link for operations involving Chinese-speaking stakeholders. Key Responsibilities 1. Translation & Communication (Core Duty): Accurately translate documents, emails, messages, and reports between English, Chinese, and Sinhala as needed. Facilitate clear communication during calls, virtual meetings, or in-person discussions with Chinese partners, clients, or suppliers. Prepare and proofread bilingual correspondence and presentations.  2. Personal & Administrative Assistance: Manage schedules, appointments, travel arrangements, and itineraries. Handle email management, call screening, and diary coordination. Organize meetings, prepare agendas, and take minutes.  Assist with basic bookkeeping, expense reporting, and document filing.  3. Liaison & Cultural Bridge: Act as a key point of contact and cultural liaison for Chinese-related business matters. Assist in building and maintaining positive relationships with Chinese contacts. Help navigate cultural nuances in business etiquette and communication.  4. Operational Support: Conduct research in both English and Chinese. Assist with project coordination and follow-up on tasks. Perform other ad-hoc duties as required to support efficiency.  Qualifications & Requirements Language Skills: Fluent (Native or Near-Native) in Mandarin Chinese. Fluent in English (both written and spoken). Proficiency in Sinhala or Tamil is a significant advantage.  Experience: At least 1-2 years of experience in an administrative, PA, or translation role. Proven experience working in a bilingual (English-Chinese) environment is essential.  Skills & Competencies: Exceptional organizational and time-management skills. Strong written and verbal communication abilities in both languages. Proficiency in MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) and communication tools (Zoom, Teams, etc.). Discretion and ability to handle confidential information. Proactive problem-solver with a keen attention to detail. Ability to work independently with minimal supervision. Salary & Benefits Monthly Salary: US $700. This is a fixed gross monthly salary. Payment: Salary will be paid in Sri Lankan Rupees (LKR). The conversion from USD will be calculated using a fair and transparent exchange rate. Work Environment: Opportunity to work in a pivotal role with significant responsibility and cross-cultural exposure.  PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS

title: Junior Legal Officer
description: SAVE JOB About Us JXG (Janashakthi Group) is a Sri Lankan financial conglomerate, bringing together leading businesses in insurance, finance and investment banking: First Capital Holdings PLC, Janashakthi Insurance PLC, Janashakthi Finance PLC and our philanthropic arm, the Janashakthi Foundation. Founded in the early 1990s by Mr. C.T.A. Schaffter, who transformed the insurance industry, JXG has grown through strategic expansion, innovation and bold decisions. The 'X' in our name symbolizes exciting opportunities, expansion and exponential growth, reflecting the shared potential of our people and businesses to drive progress and create lasting impact. Join us for a rewarding career with endless opportunities for career development and personal growth. Junior Legal Officer Job Responsibilities Represent the company and make applications and submissions in courts on its behalf. Draft plaints, answers, petitions, and other relevant pleadings to be filed in court. Organize and maintain legal and litigation files and records. Communicate with clients, external counsel, and internal departments as directed by members of the legal team. Conduct research on legal issues, statutes, case law, regulations, and legal precedents. Perform any other duties assigned by the Group Chief Legal Officer or the supervisor. Person Specifications Attorney-at-Law, preferably with an LL.B degree from a reputed university. Candidates who have recently completed their apprenticeship are encouraged to apply. Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite. Strong communication skills in both English and Sinhala. Excellent analytical and legal research skills. Well-organised, detail-oriented, and collaborative, with the confidence to represent the company before courts and other law enforcement authorities (Training provided). PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS View Job Ad

title: Senior Executive - WFM / RTA
description: Job Description Monitor agent adherence to schedules and provide real-time feedback. Track service levels, queue volumes, and staffing levels to ensure smooth operations. Identify call spikes, system downtimes, and other anomalies, taking corrective actions. Adjust staffing and reallocate resources based on call volume trends and business needs Manage real-time agent availability and reassign tasks as necessary. Coordinate with supervisors and teams lead to address productivity gaps. Workforce Planning: Develop and maintain workforce plans. Analyze key performance indicators (KPIs) related to workforce management and identify areas for improvement and optimization.  Provide real-time and intraday reports on key performance metrics (e.g., SLA, AHT, Occupancy). Analyze trends and recommend operational improvements. Maintain historical records of intraday events and their impact. Monitor break adherence, absenteeism, and shrinkage in real-time. Job Requirements Graduate in any discipline (bachelor's degree required). Minimum of 6 months to 1 year of experience in similar environment. Proven experience in RTA, capacity planning, scheduling, or related roles. Analytical Skills: Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities to interpret data, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions.  Communication: Very Good verbal and written communication skills to collaborate with diverse teams, present findings, and articulate strategies clearly. Technical Proficiency: Familiarity with workforce management software, data analysis tools, and proficiency in Microsoft Excel or similar applications. Flexibility: Adaptable to changing priorities and capable of handling high-pressure situations with resilience. Industry Knowledge: Understanding of industry-specific trends and best practices in workforce management and contact center operations. title: Senior Executives - Floral Productions
description: SAVE JOB WE ARE HIRING JOIN US! Kapruka Holdings PLC, Sri Lanka's largest locally-owned e-commerce enterprise, has been connecting businesses and consumers worldwide since 2003. With a strong presence in the USA, UK, and Australia, we offer over 125,000 products and collaborate with over 500 renowned brands to deliver exceptional online shopping experiences. As we continue to grow and innovate, we are seeking passionate individuals to join our team and help us shape the future of e-commerce. If you're ready to be part of a dynamic, fast-paced company committed to excellence, we'd love to hear from you! Senior Executives - Floral Productions  Key Responsibilities Manage and supervise the floral production team while overseeing daily production schedules and operations. Review flower sticker sheets and printed customer orders, ensuring all special instructions are accu- rately followed. Allocate production tasks among florists and place daily flower orders. Ensure all completed production items are properly scanned and handed over to the Head Office at the end of each day. Monitor daily availability of floral materials and stock to support uninterrupted operations.  Conduct month-end flower variance checks and report discrepancies accurately. Requirements Diploma or Degree in Floriculture, Horticulture, Operations Management, or a related field (pre- ferred). Minimum 3-5 years of experience in floral production or a similar supervisory role. Strong leadership and team management skills. Good knowledge of flower handling, stock control, and production planning. Ability to work under pressure and meet strict deadlines. Good communication and coordination skills. Age below 35 years. title: Outlet Manager
description: SAVE JOB Outlet Manager Luxe Colombo is seeking an experienced and results-driven Outlet Manager to lead our retail operations and deliver exceptional customer experiences. Key Responsibilities: Oversee day-to-day outlet operations and staff supervision Drive sales performance and achieve monthly targets Manage, train, and motivate outlet sales staff Ensure excellent customer service standards are maintained Handle cash management, billing, and daily sales reports Monitor stock levels, inventory, and stock replenishment Implement visual merchandising and brand guidelines Handle customer complaints and resolve issues professionally Coordinate with Head Office on sales, staffing, and operations Ensure compliance with company policies and procedures Requirements: Diploma or Degree in Retail Management, Business, or related field Minimum 2–3 years’ experience as an Outlet Manager / Supervisor in retail Strong leadership and team management skills Proven ability to achieve sales targets and KPIs Good communication and problem-solving skills Experience in retail will be an added advantage Willingness to work shifts, weekends, and holidays PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS

title: Supervisor / Shift Manager
description: SAVE JOB Supervisor / Shift Manager | Colombo (Popeyes) Softlogic Restaurants (Pvt) Ltd., a fully-owned subsidiary of Softlogic Holdings PLC, is a frontrunner in Sri Lanka's restaurant industry operating master franchises for leading global restaurant brands such as BURGER KING®, Crystal Jade, Délifrance, Baskin-Robbins, Popeyes & Subway. Operating six international brands, Softlogic Restaurants (Pvt) Ltd., is one of the biggest restaurant brand owners in the country. WE ARE LOOKING FOR A TALENTED, COMPETENT TEAM WORKER FOR THE BELOW MENTIONED DESIGNATION. JOB PROFILE To carry out QSC (Quality, Service & Cleanliness) checks including meat cook outs. To ensure regular travel paths to monitor shift controls. To draw up and implement staff positioning plans through a shift. To ensure correct stock levels of product during a shift with special attention to peak times to assist with service times. To ensure that all equipment's are kept within hygiene standards required. To ensure all accidents or incidents in the restaurant are reported fully. To be a leader and make sure all staff are "HAPPY" and are motivated and energetic to adhere our mission. Provide on-the-job training to new staff and corrective training to all staff. Develop staff members' skills and workstation proficiency toward Service Expert level. REQUIREMENTS Age between 22-40 years. Minimum 2-year experience as a supervisor or shift manager in a chain of international fast food restaurant, reputed hotel, reputed chain of restaurant or reputed chain of supermarket is mandatory. Should be innovative, dynamic and able to work together to meet the deadlines. Fluent in English language. Should possess strong interpersonal skills. PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS

විශිෂ්ට පාරිභෝගික සේවාවක් සහතික කිරීමට වගකිවයුතු සහ පළපුරුදු අධීක්ෂකවරයෙකු අපි සොයමින් සිටිමු. ප්‍රධාන වගකීම් දෛනික වැඩමුළුව සහ සේවා ස්ථාන මෙහෙයුම් අධීක්ෂණය කිරීම තාක්ෂණ ශිල්පීන් සහ සහායක කාර්ය මණ්ඩල කාලසටහන් කළමනාකරණය කිරීම වාහන සේවා සහ අලුත්වැඩියාවන් වල තත්ත්ව පාලනය සහතික කිරීම පාරිභෝගික විමසීම්, පැමිණිලි සහ සේවා පසු විපරම් හසුරුවන්න මෙවලම්, අමතර කොටස් සහ සැපයුම් ඉන්වෙන්ටරි පවත්වා ගැනීම ආරක්ෂිත ප්‍රමිතීන් සහ සමාගම් ප්‍රතිපත්ති අනුගමනය කරන බව සහතික කිරීම මූලික වාර්තා සකස් කර ව්‍යාපාර වර්ධන මුලපිරීම් සඳහා සහාය වීම අවශ්‍යතා වාහන සේවා ස්ථානයක හෝ මෝටර් රථ වැඩමුළුවක පෙර අත්දැකීම් ශක්තිමත් නායකත්වය සහ කණ්ඩායම් කළමනාකරණ කුසලතා වාහන සේවා සහ අලුත්වැඩියා ක්‍රියාවලීන් පිළිබඳ හොඳ දැනුමක් විශිෂ්ට සන්නිවේදන සහ පාරිභෝගික සේවා කුසලතා මූලික පරිගණක සහ වාර්තා තබා ගැනීමේ කුසලතා පීඩනය යටතේ වැඩ කිරීමට සහ ගැටළු කාර්යක්ෂමව විසඳීමට ඇති හැකියාව කැමති සුදුසුකම් මෝටර් රථ හෝ කළමනාකරණ ආශ්‍රිත ක්ෂේත්‍රයේ ඩිප්ලෝමාව හෝ සහතික කිරීම අධීක්ෂණ හෝ කළමනාකරණ භූමිකාවක පළපුරුද්ද අප පිරිනමන දේ ආකර්ශනීය වැටුපක් සහායාත්මක වැඩ පරිසරය වෘත්තීය වර්ධනය සඳහා අවස්ථාව කාර්ය සාධනය මත පදනම් වූ දිරිගැන්වීම් XPRESSJOBS හරහා ඔබේ CV යැවීමට කරුණාකර අයදුම් කිරීමේ බොත්තම ක්ලික් කරන්න

title: Manager
description: SAVE JOB Manager Key Responsibilities: Team Leadership & Management Supervise, coach, and mentor team members. Assign tasks and monitor performance to ensure targets are met. Conduct performance appraisals, feedback sessions, and training needs assessments. Operational Oversight Ensure smooth day-to-day operations within the department. Develop and implement processes to improve efficiency. Monitor workflow and resolve operational issues. Planning & Strategy Assist in planning departmental budgets and resource allocation. Participate in strategic planning to align departmental goals with company objectives. Communication & Coordination Act as a liaison between staff, senior management, and other departments. Communicate policies, procedures, and updates clearly to the team. Compliance & Quality Control Ensure departmental activities comply with company policies and regulatory requirements. Maintain high standards of quality and service within the department. Reporting & Documentation Prepare regular reports on team performance, productivity, and issues. Maintain accurate records for audits, HR, and management review. Qualifications & Skills: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Management, or a relevant field. Minimum 2–3 years of experience in a supervisory or managerial role. Strong leadership, interpersonal, and communication skills. Problem-solving and decision-making abilities. Knowledge of industry-specific practices and regulations (depending on sector). Proficiency in Microsoft Office or relevant management software. title: මුදල් අයකැමි (ගැහැණු) / Cashier (Female Only)
description: SAVE JOB මුදල් අයකැමි (ගැහැණු) රැකියා සාරාංශය: අපගේ කණ්ඩායමට සම්බන්ධ වීමට අපි විශ්වාසදායක සහ මිත්‍රශීලී මුදල් අයකැමියෙකු සොයමින් සිටිමු. පරමාදර්ශී අපේක්ෂකයාට විශිෂ්ට පාරිභෝගික සේවා කුසලතා, විස්තර කෙරෙහි අවධානය යොමු කිරීම සහ ගනුදෙනු නිවැරදිව හැසිරවීමේ හැකියාව තිබිය යුතුය. මුදල් අයකැමියෙකු ලෙස, විකුණුම් ගනුදෙනු සැකසීම, මුදල් සහ කාඩ්පත් ගෙවීම් කළමනාකරණය කිරීම සහ ධනාත්මක පාරිභෝගික අත්දැකීමක් සහතික කිරීම සඳහා ඔබ වගකිව යුතුය. ප්‍රධාන වගකීම්: මුදල් ලේඛනය ක්‍රියාත්මක කිරීම සහ විකුණුම් ගනුදෙනු කාර්යක්ෂමව හා නිවැරදිව සැකසීම. මුදල් මාරු කිරීම සහ රිසිට්පත් නිකුත් කිරීම ඇතුළුව මුදල්, ණය සහ හර කාඩ්පත් ගනුදෙනු හසුරුවන්න. පාරිභෝගික විමසීම් ආමන්ත්‍රණය කිරීමෙන්, ගැටළු විසඳීමෙන් සහ ධනාත්මක අත්දැකීමක් සහතික කිරීමෙන් සුවිශේෂී පාරිභෝගික සේවාවක් සැපයීම. මිල ගණන් නිවැරදි බව සහතික කිරීම සහ අවශ්‍ය පරිදි වට්ටම් සහ ප්‍රවර්ධන යෙදීම. සැපයුම් නැවත ගබඩා කිරීම සහ වෙළඳ භාණ්ඩ ප්‍රදර්ශන කළමනාකරණය කිරීම ඇතුළුව පිරිසිදු හා සංවිධානාත්මක පිටවීමේ ප්‍රදේශයක් පවත්වා ගැනීම. මුදල්, ප්‍රතිලාභ සහ හුවමාරු හැසිරවීම සඳහා ගබඩා ප්‍රතිපත්ති සහ ක්‍රියා පටිපාටි අනුගමනය කිරීම. අවශ්‍ය පරිදි ඉන්වෙන්ටරි කළමනාකරණය සහ නැවත ගබඩා කිරීම සඳහා සහාය වීම. කණ්ඩායම් සාමාජිකයින් සමඟ සහයෝගයෙන් කටයුතු කිරීම සහ කළමනාකරු විසින් පවරා ඇති අනෙකුත් කාර්යයන් සඳහා සහාය වීම. සුදුසුකම්: අ.පො.ස. උසස් පෙළ / ඩිප්ලෝමා හෝ ඊට සමාන සුදුසුකම් වඩාත් සුදුසු වේ පෙර මුදල් අයකැමි හෝ සිල්ලර වෙළඳාම පිළිබඳ පළපුරුද්ද අමතර සුදුසුකමක් වන නමුත් අවශ්‍ය නොවේ. ශක්තිමත් ගණිතමය කුසලතා සහ විස්තර කෙරෙහි අවධානය යොමු කිරීම. විශිෂ්ට පාරිභෝගික සේවා සහ සන්නිවේදන කුසලතා. වේගවත් පරිසරයක වැඩ කිරීමට සහ ඉහළ ගනුදෙනු ප්‍රමාණයක් හැසිරවීමට ඇති හැකියාව. ශක්තිමත් වැඩ ආචාර ධර්ම සමඟ විශ්වාසදායක සහ වෙලාවට වැඩ කරන. අවශ්‍ය පරිදි සවස් කාලයේ, සති අන්තයේ සහ නිවාඩු දිනවල වැඩ කිරීමට හැකි විය යුතුය. XpressJobs හරහා ඔබේ CV එක යැවීමට කරුණාකර අයදුම් කිරීමේ බොත්තම ක්ලික් කරන්න. Cashier (Female Only) Job Summary:  We are seeking a reliable and friendly Cashier to join our team. The ideal candidate will have excellent customer service skills, attention to detail, and the ability to handle transactions accurately. As a Cashier, you will be responsible for processing sales transactions, managing cash and card payments, and ensuring a positive customer experience. Key Responsibilities: Operate the cash register and process sales transactions efficiently and accurately. Handle cash, credit, and debit card transactions, including giving change and issuing receipts. Provide exceptional customer service by addressing customer inquiries, resolving issues, and ensuring a positive shopping experience. Scan items and ensure that prices are correct, and apply discounts and promotions as needed. Maintain a clean and organized checkout area, including restocking supplies and managing merchandise displays. Follow store policies and procedures for handling cash, returns, and exchanges. Assist with inventory management and restocking as needed. Collaborate with team members and assist with other tasks as assigned by the supervisor or manager. Qualifications: After A/L / diploma or equivalent preferred. Previous cashier or retail experience is a plus, but not required. Strong mathematical skills and attention to detail. Excellent customer service and communication skills. Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle high volumes of transactions. Reliable and punctual with a strong work ethic. Flexible availability, including evenings, weekends, and holidays as needed. PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS

title: Bar Supervisor
description:
SAVE JOB බාර් සුපවයිසර් | කොහුවල ලාෆ්ස් සමූහ ව්‍යාපාරයේ අනුබද්ධිත සමාගමක් වන ලාෆ්ස් සුපර්මාර්කට් (පෞද්ගලික) සමාගම දිවයින පුරා වේගයෙන් ව්‍යාප්ත වන සුපිරි වෙළඳසැල් ජාලයක් ඇත. දේශීය සමාගමක විශිෂ්ට සාමාජිකයෙකු වී ඔබේ ජීවිතය ජය ගැනීමට ඔබ සූදානම්ද? අවම අවශ්‍යතා, වයස අවුරුදු 18 සහ 40 අතර. ගැහැණු/පිරිමි දෙපාර්ශවයටම අප හා සම්බන්ධ විය හැක. ගණිතය සඳහා S සාමාර්ථයක් සමඟ G.C.E (O/L) සම්පූර්ණ කර තිබිය යුතුය අවම වශයෙන් අවුරුදු 2 ක පළපුරුද්දක් ( Bar )  වැටුප් සහ ප්‍රතිලාභ, ආකර්ශනීය මාසික වැටුප නිදහස් තීරුබදු ආහාර, නවාතැන් *කොන්දේසි සහිතයි* වෛද්ය රැකවරණය සම්මුඛ පරීක්ෂණ සඳහා: ජාතික හැඳුනුම්පත, උප්පැන්න සහතිකය, ග්‍රාම නිලධාරී සහතිකය, වෘත්තීය සුදුසුකම් සහතිකය, අධ්‍යාපන සහතිකය, වාණිජ බැංකු ඉතුරුම් ගිණුමක මුල් පිටුවේ ඡායා පිටපතක් (ලිපිනය, ගිණුම් අංකය සහ අත්සන් කළ පිටුව), වෙනත් සහතිකවල මුල් පිටපත් සහ ඡායා පිටපත් රැගෙන එන්න. . XpressJobs හරහා ඔබගේ විස්තර යැවීමට කරුණාකර අයදුම් කිරීමේ බොත්තම ක්ලික් කරන්න. Bar Supervisor | Kohuwala Laugfs Supermarkets (Pvt) Ltd, a subsidiary of The Laugfs Group, has a fast-expanding network of supermarkets across the island. Are you ready to be an excellent member of a local company and win your life? Minimum Requirements, Between the ages of 18 and 40. Both Males/Females are welcome to join us. Completed G.C.E (O/L) with C pass for Mathematics At least 2 years of experience  Salary & Benefits, Attractive monthly salary  Free duty food,  Accommodation conditions applied Medical care For interviews: Bring
 a National Identity Card, Birth Certificate, Grama Niladhari 
Certificate, Vocational Qualification Certificate, Education 
Certificate, a photocopy of the front page of a commercial bank savings 
account (address, account number, and signed page), originals, and 
photocopies of other certificates. PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR DETAILS VIA XPRESSJOBS

title: Supervisor - Dark Store
description: Job Role :  Regularly check the expiry dates of all products and ensure timely stock rotation.  Maintain the freshness and quality of products to deliver the best customer experience.   Escalate any issues promptly and ensure swift resolution.  Coordinate with relevant departments to resolve discrepancies and quality issues.  Assist in the overall running of the Dark Store.  Perform clerical and administrative functions as required.  Provide administrative support to executive management.  Candidate Requirements:  Passionate about Sri Lanka; you're committed to making a positive impact for our Country and its people.  Successfully completed GCE Ordinary Levels (OLs) and Advanced Levels (ALs).  Proficiency in IT & MS Office applications  Higher National Diploma  Ability to multitask, prioritize, and manage time effectively, ensuring timely completion  of tasks.  Well-organized with exceptional attention to detail, consistently demonstrating integrity, accuracy, and thoroughness in all tasks.  Ambitious with a can-do mindset, willing to take on challenges and exceed expectations.  Leadership experience.  Problem-solving abilities.  Good communication & interpersonal skills.  Demonstrate positive behavioral skills of Cargills Values: Customer Centric, Accountable, Respect, Green, Innovative, Love, Lead & Serve the Nation.   PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS APPLY FOR JOB SAVE JOB Unemployment in Sri Lanka is estimated to be over 390,816, Share this job and help another! description: SAVE JOB පිරිසිදු කිරීමේ අධීක්ෂකවරුන් | ඩුබායි සුදුසුකම් නිර්ණායක අපේක්ෂකයින් එක්සත් අරාබි එමීර් රාජ්‍යයේ පහසුකම් කළමනාකරණ සමාගමක සේවය කිරීමට සූදානම් විය යුතුය පිරිසිදු කිරීමේ අධීක්ෂකවරුන් GCC හි පහසුකම් කළමනාකරණ සමාගමක පිරිසිදු කිරීමේ අධීක්ෂකවරයෙකු ලෙස අවම වශයෙන් අවුරුදු 03 ක පළපුරුද්දක් සහිත උපාධිධාරියෙකු විය යුතුය BICS සහතිකය ඇති අපේක්ෂකයින්  වඩාත් සුදුසු වේ අපේක්ෂකයින්ට එක් ස්ථානයක පිරිසිදු කරන්නන් 50 දෙනෙකුගෙන් යුත් කණ්ඩායමක් හැසිරවීමේ අත්දැකීම් තිබිය යුතුය. අපේක්ෂකයින්ට සාප්පු සංකීර්ණ කළමනාකරණය, දේපළ කළමනාකරණය, පාසල් සහ රෝහල් සමඟ වැඩ කිරීමේ පළපුරුද්ද තිබිය යුතුය අපේක්ෂකයින් ඉංග්‍රීසි කතා කරන විය යුතුය අපේක්ෂකයින් දෘශ්‍යමාන පච්ච කොටා නොතිබිය යුතුය වයස අවුරුදු 20 - 38 අතර විය යුතුය අපේක්ෂකයින් වීසා ලැබුණු වහාම ගමන් කිරීමට සූදානම් විය යුතුය අවශ්‍ය ලියකියවිලි CV විදේශ ගමන් බලපත්‍ර පිටපත - Jpeg ආකෘතිය ඩිජිටල් සුදු පසුබිම් ඡායාරූපය - Jpeg ආකෘතිය අධ්‍යාපන සහතිකය අත්දැකීම් සහතිකය පැරණි වීසා පිටපත (ඇත්නම්) පැරණි එමිරේට්ස් හැඳුනුම්පතේ පිටපත (ඇත්නම්) එන්නත් වාර්තාව සම්මුඛ පරීක්ෂණය සඳහා අපේක්ෂකයින් ඔවුන්ගේ මුල් විදේශ ගමන් බලපත්‍ර රැගෙන යා යුතුය XpressJobs හරහා ඔබේ CV යැවීමට කරුණාකර අයදුම් කිරීමේ බොත්තම ක්ලික් කරන්න Cleaning Supervisors | Dubai Eligibility Criteria Candidates should be ready to work for a Facilities Management Company in UAE  Cleaning Supervisors should be a graduate with a minimum of 03 Years Experience as a Cleaning Supervisor in Facilities Management Company in GCC Preference to candidates with BICS Certification Candidates should have experience in handling a Team of 50 Cleaners in one location. title: අධීක්ෂක - Supervisor
description: SAVE JOB අධීක්ෂක Viron Motors යනු දිවුලපිටිය පාර, මිනුවන්ගොඩ පිහිටි, බර වාහන (Heavy Vehicles) සහ සැහැල්ලු වාහන (Light Vehicles) යන දෙකම අලුත්වැඩියා කිරීමේ හා නඩත්තු කිරීමේ පහසුකම් සහිතව සේවාවන් සපයන ආයතනයකි. අපගේ වර්ධනය වන කණ්ඩායම සඳහා කැපවූ සහ පළපුරුදු කාර්මික ශිල්පීන් සහ අධීක්ෂකවරයෙකු බඳවා ගැනීමට අප බලාපොරොත්තු වෙමු. මූලික වගකීම්: ආයතනයේ දෛනික කටයුතු අධීක්ෂණය කිරීම, කාර්යයන් සැලසුම් කිරීම සහ කාර්ය මණ්ඩලයට පැවරීම. කාර්මික ශිල්පීන්ගේ වැඩ කටයුතු පරීක්ෂා කිරීමෙන් උසස් තත්ත්වයේ අලුත්වැඩියාවන් සහතික කිරීම. ගනුදෙනුකරුවන් සමඟ සන්නිවේදනය කරමින් අලුත්වැඩියා කටයුතු පිළිබඳ පැහැදිලි කිරීම් ලබා දීම. අලුත්වැඩියා කටයුතු සඳහා අවශ්‍ය අමතර කොටස් සහ උපකරණ කළමනාකරණය කිරීම. කාර්මික ශිල්පීන්ට තාක්ෂණික උපදෙස් සහ පුහුණුව ලබා දීම. වැඩ නිම කිරීමට ගතවන කාලය සහ පිරිවැය ඇස්තමේන්තු කිරීම. සියලුම සේවක ආරක්ෂණ සහ සෞඛ්‍ය ප්‍රමිතීන් පවත්වාගෙන යාම. අවශ්‍ය සුදුසුකම්: මෝටර් රථ අලුත්වැඩියා ක්ෂේත්‍රයේ අවම වශයෙන් වසර 3ක අධීක්ෂණ හෝ නායකත්ව පළපුරුද්දක් සහිතව වසර ගණනාවක පළපුරුද්ද. බර හා සැහැල්ලු වාහන යාන්ත්‍රික පද්ධති පිළිබඳ විශිෂ්ට දැනුමක්. ගැටළු විසඳීමේ සහ තීරණ ගැනීමේ ප්‍රබල හැකියාවක්. කණ්ඩායමක් මෙහෙයවීමට සහ කාර්යයන් ගුණාත්මකව කාර්යක්ෂම ව කිරීමට ඇති හැකියාව. සිංහල සහ ඉංග්‍රීසි භාෂා දෙකෙන්ම හොඳ සන්නිවේදන කුසලතා අමතර වාසියකි. XPRESSJOBS හරහා ඔබගේ CV එක යැවීමට කරුණාකර අයදුම් කරන්න බොත්තම ක්ලික් කරන්න. Supervisor Viron Motors is a company located on Divulapitiya Road, Minuwangoda, providing services with facilities for repairing and maintaining both Heavy Vehicles and Light Vehicles. We are looking to recruit dedicated and experienced Technicians and a Supervisor to join our growing team. Primary Responsibilities: Oversee the daily operations of the organization, plan tasks and assign them to staff. Ensure high quality repairs by inspecting the work of technicians. Communicate with customers and provide explanations on repair work. Manage spare parts and equipment required for repair work. Provide technical advice and training to technicians. Estimate time and cost to complete work. Maintain all employee safety and health standards. Required Qualifications: A minimum of 3 years of supervisory or leadership experience in the automotive repair field with several years of experience. Excellent knowledge of heavy and light vehicle mechanical systems. Strong problem-solving and decision-making skills. Ability to lead a team and perform tasks efficiently and effectively. Good communication skills in both Sinhala and English are an added advantage. PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS

title: A/C සුපරීක්ෂකවරුන් / A/C Supervisors
description: SAVE JOB A/C සුපරීක්ෂකවරුන් යුතුකම් සහ වගකීම් සෞඛ්‍ය සහ ආරක්ෂක ප්‍රමිතීන්ට අනුකූල බව සමීක්ෂණය කිරීම සහ යාන්ත්‍රික පද්ධති අලුත්වැඩියා කිරීම විදුලි පද්ධති නඩත්තු කිරීම (විදුලි බල්බ සහ සොකට් ආදේශ කිරීම, පරිපථ කඩන පැනල් පිරිසිදු කිරීම සහ අලුත්වැඩියා කිරීම ආදිය) වෙන්ටිලේශන්, ශීතකරණ සහ අනෙකුත් පද්ධති සැකසීමට සහය වීම සහ අවශ්ය විට අලුත්වැඩියා කටයුතු සිදු කිරීම සාමාන්‍ය  නඩත්තු ක්‍රියාපටිපාටි පැවැත්වීම පළපුරුද්ද සහ සුදුසුකම් විදුලි කාර්මිකයෙකු හෝ AC සහ REF කාර්මික ශිල්පියෙකු ලෙස වසරක පළපුරුද්ද විදුලි කාර්මික හෝ AC සහ ශීතකරණ ආධුනිකත්ව පුහුණුවක් සම්පූර්ණ කිරීම XpressJobs හරහා ඔබේ CV යැවීමට කරුණාකර අයදුම් කිරීමේ බොත්තම ක්ලික් කරන්න ප්‍රධාන කාර්යාලය: මානව සම්පත් දෙපාර්තමේන්තුව, අංක 310, හයිලෙවල් පාර, නාවින්න, මහරගම. A/C Supervisors Duties and Responsibilities Survey buildings and repair mechanical systems to ensure they are consistent with health and safety standards Perform maintenance of electrical systems (replace light bulbs and sockets, clean and repair circuit breaker panels etc.) Assist in the setup of ventilation, refrigeration and other systems and conduct repairs when necessary Maintain heating and plumbing systems to ensure functionality Perform manual repairs when necessary (fix locks, replace windows etc.) Conduct general upkeep procedures Experience and Qualification 2 year experience working as an Electrician or AC and REF Technician Experience in renewable energy field Completion of Electrician or AC and Refrigeration apprenticeship Ability to work well under pressure PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS Head Office: Human Resources Department, No. 310, High Level Road, Nawinna, Maharagama.

title: Operations Supervisor
description: SAVE JOB Operations Supervisor | Moratuwa  Wedage & Company, a trusted leader in refrigerated logistics with over 30 years of excellence, is seeking a proactive and dedicated Operations Supervisor to join our operations in Moratuwa, Sri Lanka. This exciting role involves managing a team at one of our key customers’ onsite locations, ensuring seamless coordination and exceptional service delivery. If you thrive in a fast-paced environment and have a passion for leadership and logistics, we want you to be part of our legacy! Key Responsibilities: Oversee and manage drivers, ensuring timely arrivals and departures at the onsite location. Supervise fuel pumping operations for vehicles, maintaining compliance with rate standards. Troubleshoot and manage engine-related issues to ensure operational efficiency. Resolve conflicts professionally, fostering a positive and collaborative work environment. Coordinate effectively with the customer’s staff and Wedage & Company’s head office to streamline operations. Collect, review, and maintain accurate timesheets, ensuring proper documentation and compliance. Who We’re Looking For: A reliable, organized, and detail-oriented individual based in Moratuwa, Sri Lanka. Strong leadership and communication skills with the ability to manage teams and resolve conflicts. Experience in logistics, vehicle management, or a related field is a plus. Ability to multitask and thrive under pressure while maintaining high standards. What We Offer: Competitive compensation package. Fuel allowance for work-related travel. A company-provided smartphone and laptop to support your role. Opportunities for growth within a well-established, industry-leading organization. A supportive team environment with a focus on professional development. PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS

The Role Plan and coordinate examination schedules and timetables. Oversee examination logistics, invigilation, and compliance. Ensure timely release of results and preparation of transcripts & certificates. Implement examination policies, SOPs, and data protection standards. Supervise examination staff and conduct training programs. Drive digital solutions and automation in examination processes. (Preference will be given to applicants who have obtained a Bachelors Degree with a class)  Knowledge of Learning Management Systems (LMS), MS Excel, etc. Strong leadership, supervisory, and problem-solving skills. Work Location :  SLTC Padukka PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS View Job Ad

title: Transport and Logistics Officer
description: SAVE JOB We are a prominent player in the poultry industry, renowned as one of Sri Lanka's largest egg producers under the brand name 'Happy Hen.' Holding ISO 22000 and HACCP Certification, GMP,  we maintain the highest standards in our operations. About The Role: Are you a strategic thinker with a passion for Transport and Logistics? We're looking for a dynamic Transport and Logistics Officer to oversee and optimize our fleet operations, ensuring efficient transport and timely maintenance across our organization. Transport and Logistics Officer Requirements: An energetic individual between 30 to 50 years. A Diploma in Logistics, Motor mechanics or other relevant qualification. Minimum 3-5 years of experience in logistics operations, preferably in a supervisory role.  Strong leadership and team management skills. Excellent problem-solving, organizational, and communication abilities. Proficient in a transport/logistics management system and MS Office Suite. Strong knowledge of vehicle mechanics and fleet maintenance practices. Excellent leadership, communication, and organizational skills. Valid driver's license and relevant professional certifications (preferred). Responsibilities: Oversee the day-to-day management of the company owned and hired lorries. Ensure compliance with transport regulations, health & safety, and environmental policies. Develop and implement preventative maintenance schedules for vehicles. Manage vehicle inspections, repairs, and servicing to minimize downtime. Supervise a team of drivers, mechanics, and support staff, including scheduling and performance management. Monitor fuel consumption, costs, and route planning to ensure operational efficiency. Maintain accurate records of maintenance, repairs, and transport activities. Coordinate with external vendors and service providers as needed. Benefits: Competitive salary and performance-based incentives. Opportunities for career growth and development. Eligibility for a hospitalization cover after confirmation. We appreciate all applications, but only shortlisted candidates will be contacted. Thank you for your interest in joining our team. PLEASE CLICK THE APPLY BUTTON TO SEND YOUR CV VIA XPRESSJOBS View Job Ad
